name: Ha Giang Hostel
address: Thôn Lâm Đồng, xã Phương Thiện, TP. Hà Giang 6 tầng, Hà Giang, Việt Nam
description:
Ha Giang Hostel có khu vườn, phòng chờ chung, sân hiên và nhà hàng ở Hà Giang. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, bếp chung và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Tại khách sạn, tất cả các phòng đều được thiết kế có tủ quần áo. Ngoài phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí, một số căn tại Ha Giang Hostel cũng có view thành phố. Các phòng tại chỗ nghỉ có điều hòa và bàn làm việc.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Wenshan Puzhehei, cách Ha Giang Hostel 146 km.

Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive:
We booked 4 days motorbike tour with Ha Giang Loop Tour team and it was the best experience of our travelling across Vietnam. The scenery around Ha giang is so awesome and breathtaking. You have to do it! We made a reservation for loop with easy drivers. It was very good decision, because you can only sit and enjoy wonderful views. 
Our guide was Hung and he was so professional, helpful, kind and responsible. We made a friendship for the rest of life. Thank you for you caring, hardwork, time and love.
Communication and organisation was great. In price you have accommodations for all nights. You can choose in advance private room/dorm. Also all foods, fuel, easy drivers, one bottle of water for day, helmet, protection, everything what you need in these 3 days… It was worth every dolar. We sit all together in evening and was speaking with happy water (local alcohol from corn). Thank you for this adventure

review.comment_positive:
Die Lage ist perfekt vor allem wenn man nachts ankommt, einchecken und schlafen möchte. Auch die Möglichkeit direkt Roller zu buchen und sein Gepäck während des Loops abzustellen ist praktisch. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Als wir auf dem Loop in eine Polizeikontrolle kamen, hat ein Mitarbeiter telefonisch die Angelegenheit geregelt und wir mussten nichts zahlen und konnten weiterfahren! 
Als wir zurück kamen, konnten wir noch duschen und bis unser Bus kam dort die Zeit verbringen. Wir können diese Unterkunft sehr empfehlen.

review.rating: Güler yüzlü personel ve temiz hostel
review.comment_positive:
Ha giang loop’a başlamadan önceki gece ve loop’tan sonraki gece burda konakladım. 
Gerçekten yardımsever ve güzel insanlar çalışıyor burda. Dorm ve odalar temiz. Her ikisinde de kaldım birer gece. Klimalar var, otel serin. Bütün yardımları ve güler yüzleri için Tan ve Duc’a teşekkür ederim tekrardan. İkisi de ingilizce konuşabiliyor. Hatta tan benim yetersiz ingilizceme rağmen her konuda yardımcı oldu ve güzel öneriler sundu. Sizi her konuda anlayıp yardımcı olmaya çalışıyor. Onlar dışında da adlarını bilmediğim diğer çalışanlar da, hepsi çok iyi insanlardı. 

Burda motorsiklet kiralayabiliyorsunuz. 2 farklı opsiyonunuz var. 1.si kendiniz sürersiniz, 2.si easydriver seçeneği. 2.sini seçerseniz size özel bir şöför oluyor ve grupça loop’u tamamlıyorsunuz. Gördüğüm kadarıyla Loop için her şey düşünülmüş. Yanınızda taşımak istemeyeceğiniz büyük sırt çantalarınızı da hostelde bırakabilirsiniz.
review.comment_negative: Bu bir olumsuz yorum değil, sadece küçük bir bilgi. Burası loop için gelenlere uygun. Ya da biraz sessizlik isteyenlere. Zaten Ha Giang merkezde turistik anlamda pek bir şey yok. O yüzden otel çok sessiz. Gürültü ve sosyallik beklentiniz olmasın :)

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive:
Great 3 day tour on Ha Giang Loop with Hinh and the rest of the Ha Giang Hostel team. We discovered Vietnamese culture by staying in homestays where we shared great moments.
Smiling, funny and generous people ! I recommend !

Wir sind mit dem Nachtbus aus Cat Ba um 4 Uhr morgens eingetroffen und durften vor dem Check In für den Abend ( Zimmer waren alle gebucht) in einem sepersten Raum auf Matratzen schlafen. Die Motorräder, die wir gemietet haben, waren brandneu und bei einem Platten mitten im nirgenwo wurde uns innerhalb von einer halben Stunde jemand zur Reparatur geschickt. Es gab auf Nachfrage eine kurze Einweisung zur Semi-Automatik und eine Beschreibung der Route sowie Tipps und eine Karte gegeben.
Das Zimmer war sehr sauber und komfortabel.
Das Hostel hat zudem eine schöne Dachterasse, wo man ein Banh Mi zum Frühstück serviert bekommt.
Gerne wieder.

The location was great. Many restaurants and cafes are nearby. 
The bedroom was clean but small. 
You can rent a motorbike directly from the homestay. The staff provides you with a bunch of equipment such as rope, straps, phone holder, rain covers, helmet. Additionally, they offer a discount if you rent a motorbike directly from the homestay. We liked the gesture.
review.comment_negative: The breakfast is ok.

review.comment_positive: Khách sạn sạch sẽ, đáp ứng đủ nhu cầu cơ bản. Giá cả hợp lý.
The rooms and bathrooms are very clean and modern. Also there is a nice breakfast is included in the price!
review.comment_negative: At our second stay at the hostel after returning from the loop, they tried to bring us to a different location due to some issues with the room. After a short discussion we were able to stay in the room we had originally booked, so all good! However, it made the impression that this was caused by us neither booking a tour nor a motorcycle through them.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể

review.comment_positive:
We did the Ha Giang Loop and our tour guide named Phong was just amazing. While being extremely knowledgeable in the area he also is a lot of fun. He showed us the most stunning places and introduced us to his friends in the villages so we got a very authentic experience.

The staff and the especially also the owner of the hostel are very helpful and kind.

review.rating: Good value stay in Ha Giang
review.comment_positive: Viet and his team are excellent hosts. They went the extra mile to ensure my bus dropped me off directly at the hostel and when I left, that the bus picked me up at the doorstep. When I had an issue of needing to claim back money from an overcharged ticket, they arranged to have the money sent to the hostel for me to collect when I returned from my 3-day Ha Giang Loop tour. Laundry was handled promptly and at a reasonable charge. The breakfast is nice and on the top floor patio, which is a great place to lounge and enjoy the countryside view.
review.comment_negative:
While convenient for arranging a Ha Giang Loop tour, the hostel is some distance from the main town area. Eating options are a bit limited and pricey, although Coffee Viet a short distance to the right of the hostel served quite good food at reasonable prices.

My room had a kind of glazed window which overlooked another part of the hotel. When lights were on outside, it was impossible to block the light from shining in on your bed. For someone who finds it hard to sleep without darkness, it would be troubling. I suggested to the owner to install a blind on the window.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể

They also serve nice breakfast, which is crazy, considering how affordable the price is. Would definately stay again, can't recommend enough. Also the bike loop tour they organize is awesome, must do!

review.comment_negative: La première nuit nous avons été réveillés par des coups de marteau piqueur à 7h. L’odeur de l’humidité dans la chambre est pas très agréable et il n’y avait pas de fenêtre donnant sur l’extérieur.

review.comment_positive:
The breakfast simply simple I hope next time come back they will have more options

review.comment_positive: good stay for good money. The stuff helps with the renting of motorbike, luggage storage, breakfast was all good :)

The location is right where the sleeping bus (tbus) stops, so it was really convenient for us to stay here. There are many restaurants & bars across the road, some work really long, so you can grab something to eat or drink, if you arrive late. The staff are really kind and helpful, they also let you check-in any time (24/7). They have a lot of options for booking a tour & easy riders for the Ha Giang loop. The breakfast was really good and the view from the restaurant is beuatiful.
review.comment_negative: The room is a bit smaller than it looks on the photos. Also, the window, which was supposed to have a view of the city, actually has a 1 metre view to the wall.

review.comment_positive: Ottimo ostello, camere private pulitissime ed ampie. Bagno privato in camera comodissimo e attrezzato. Asciugamani inclusi. Aria condizionata e ventilatore perfettamente funzionante. Abbiamo preso contatti online e ci hanno aiutato per tutto: l'organizzazione dell'Ha Giang Loop e i nostri trasfer in bus per Hanoi (erano previste anche altre destinazioni es. Sapa, Nihn Bihn, Ha Long Bay). La comunicazione è stata ottima sia dall'Italia che in loco, la pianificazione anche e il prezzo del tour nella media. La colazione con vista è minimalista, ma di buona qualità. Lo consiglio vivamente!
El personal muy atento. Y nos gusto la comodidad de alquilar la moto en el mismo hostal.

review.comment_positive: Vị trí thuận lợi, gần bến xe, có cho thuê xe máy, anh chủ rất nhiệt tình hỗ trợ, nhóm mình đến lúc 4g sáng vẫn mở khách sạn để sắp phòng

review.comment_negative:
This is not nothing negative about hotel itself, but we would recommend to host to buy new helmets. Loop can be dangerous and tricky, and helmets they borrow are just old and broken like on the other places in Vietnam. We did not feel very safe.
The second thing, if you ask the host to book you a bus ticket, ask what type of bus it is and how it works. We take VIP bus from Hanoi to Ha Giang and it was awesome. But bus from Ha Giang to Cat Ba was sleeper bus from very negative bus company, which made stops on our way and grab local people, which were sitting in the aisle on the floor. Very bad experience.

review.comment_positive:
This place would be an easy 10, its so close to perfect but there is one major problem with the room which stops it.

Bike rental - was great, 250v per day for a semi automatic with insurance. Bike worked well and no problems, had to leave drivers license as deposit. They let you practice on the bike and show you how to use it which is lovely.

Room - small and practical, very comfy bed, good shower and bathroom, and kept very clean. SO close to perfect but the issue below.. shower gel and shampoo provided. Good aircon. 

Breakfast - egg omlette sandwich, tea/coffee, good and simple. 

The owner is friendly.
review.comment_negative: in the standard double room the window just goes into a view of the inside of the property/ the corridor, this is not a problem in itself (although the room is labelled as having a city view) the MASSIVE problem is that this window has NO CURTAINS OR BLINDS and the lights literally dont turn off and this window is right next to the bed directly where your head/face is so its like literally a blinding white light in your face the entire time you’re trying to sleep. We stayed in a room on arrival and another room on return and both the rooms had the exact same problem. This is such a big issue and i cant understand why they would not put blinds on the windows, if you dont have an eyemask it will be very hard to sleep.

review.comment_positive:
#HAGIANGLOOP
Chciałbym się podzielić z Wami swoimi spostrzeżeniami. Sami długo zastanawialiśmy się jak to wszystko ugryźć. Tak naprawdę przed przyjazdem do Ha Giang uparliśmy się aby w podróż wyruszyć motorem w grupie ale bez easy ridera i choć mieliśmy taką możliwość, w ostatniej chwili daliśmy się przekonać do zmiany zdania. Wyszło na dobre! Dlaczego? Moje subiektywne spostrzeżenia:
1. Sama trasa jest dość trudna- miejscami brak asfaltu, miejscami jest bardzo ślisko. Jedzie się w wysokie góry, gdzie czasami widoczność jest bardzo ograniczona przez mgłę.
2. Jadąc widoki są niesamowite, natomiast trzeba się rozglądać, zerkać wysoko w góry by dostrzec miejscowych rolników czy zwierzęta. Prowadząc na takiej trasie myślę, że jest to niemożliwe, gdyż cała uwaga musi być skupiona na drodze aby zachować bezpieczeństwo.
3. Trasa nie jest oczywista, jadąc samemu trzeba orientować się w terenie, zerkać na mapę. Myślę, że akurat w takich warunkach to dodatkowy stres.
4. Kultura prowadzenia pojazdów jest zupełnie rożna od naszej. Wietnamczycy jeżdżą bardzo odważnie i na swoich zasadach.
5. W razie awarii motoru (co się zdarza) na większości odcinków brak cywilizacji, a jeśli jest- miejscowi nie mówią po angielsku.
6. Trzeba mocno pilnować się z czasem, droga jest nieoświetlona, powrót po zmroku byłby bardzo niebezpieczny.
7. Podróż w dużej grupie jest fantastyczna- daje możliwości poznania nowych osób, wspólnych rozmów, wymiany doświadczeń.
8. Easy riders to głównie miejscowi rolnicy, znają te tereny, wiedzą, gdzie są najpiękniejsze widoki, prowadzą motory bezpiecznie a dodatkowo Wietnamczycy przy dłużej chwili poznania to naprawdę ciepli i sympatyczni ludzie. W naszej grupie Tour guide mówił po angielsku, także sporo dowiedzieliśmy się o życiu mieszkańców regionu Ha Giang. Dodatkowo jadąc z Easy Riderem wspiera się lokalną społeczność :) 

HA GIANG HOSTEL HAS IT ALL. Best guide Minh and best easy riders. Highly recommended :)

review.comment_negative:
Ils y a eu du bruit a 7h du matin a coup de marteau piqueur , peu reposant sachant qu on commencé la loop lendemain 
Un peu loin du centre 
Pas mal de toiles d araignée

review.comment_positive:
las instalaciones son modernas, cómodas, y el personal súper atento.
hicimos el loop de 4 días y al volver, a pesar de sólo haber pillado una noche, nos esperaron con toallas limpias para ducharnos mientras esperábamos el bus que se encargaron de pillarnos.
gente súper amable.
review.comment_negative: se portan demasiado, ninguna queja

review.rating: The loop trip was so fantastic . Excellent drivers who were fun , safe and very kind
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: The staff were super friendly and helpful. The drivers on the loop were incredible !! The best ever !!
review.comment_negative: The dorm smelled mouldy and was damp .

review.comment_positive: Breakfast Banh Mi was the best we had in Vietnam! Staff is helpful and cool. Private room was good, the bed was comfortable, hot water and heater worked great as well
review.comment_negative: Everything was good. Wall in our room was dirty, could use a cleaning or new paint.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Nice modern room and bathroom design, comfortable layout. Very helpful staff, exceptional loop tour. 100% will stay here again when im back in ha giang

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường

review.rating: Modern hostel with great breakfast and rooms
review.comment_positive: Spacious double rooms in a clean and friendly hostel. We didn’t do the loop with them but their tours looked great! Nice place to stay before or after the loop.
review.comment_negative: Not located in the town centre so just be mindful if staying their for multiple days.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Vị trí thuận tiện để khám phá Hà Giang. Sạch sẽ và thân thiện.

review.rating: Clean rooms, friendly staff - highly recommend
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Very clean room, comfortable bed and pillow, and excellent staff. We stayed there twice and I would happily stay there again when I next head to Ha Giang
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Hotel bien ubicado, muy cómodo y limpio.
review.comment_positive: Hasta ahora el hotel más cómodo y limpio en el que hemos estado. Cuentan con aire acondicionado. Incluye desayuno: bocadillo con tortilla, un plátano y café con buenas vistas. Tienen variedad de motos para escoger e incluye el casco. Está cerca de la estación de autobús. El hombre de recepción fue muy amable.
review.comment_negative: Tras encontrarnos con otros viajeros en el loop, nos dimos cuenta de que nuestro hotel no facilitó ni mapa ni bolsa/plástico para proteger la mochila de las lluvias. La mujer de recepción podría ser más amigable.

review.rating: Great hostel and brilliant Ha Giang Loop
review.comment_positive: The rooms so super comfortable. An amazing bed and bed covers and pillow. The room was very clean and the bathroom was lovely and modern with hot and powerful shower. The staff were so helpful. We did the loop with the hostel which was absolutely incredible. The staff leading up to our stay were so helpful.
review.comment_negative: When we returned to the hostel after the loop they forgot we had paid for our extra night stay and accused us of not paying. But that is the only thing. It was a great hostel.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể

review.rating: Perfecto para empezar el Hiang Loop
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: El autobús que te llevaba de Hanoi te dejaba en el mismo hotel y a las 4 de la mañana estaban preparados para darte la llave de la habitación. Tenía muy buenas vistas en el desayuno.
review.comment_negative: No había papel higiénico en el baño

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
Giường Đơn Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể 6 Giường

review.comment_positive:
Die Lage ist nicht Zentral aber es gibt 2 große Restaurants direkt gegenüber, einmal regionales Essen und einmal Europäisch.
Die Zimmer waren sauber und hatten KEINEN Schimmel (was leider selten der Fall ist).
Das Personal war so lieb einen unserer Rucksäcke zu lagern bis wir zurück waren, obwohl wir den Loop alleine gefahren sind und nicht mit Ihrer Tour.
review.comment_negative:
Der Föhn ist auf Anfrage verfügbar aber auch nicht tragisch.
Beim Frühstück gab es keine Auswahl aber es hat geschmeckt - ein kleines Baguette mit Ei (Banh mi).

review.rating: Tuyệt vời, sẽ đến đây lần sau nếu có cơ hội.
review.comment_positive: Anh chủ rất rất tốt, nhiệt tình gọi giúp xe ô tô, cho mượn xe máy dạo thành phố. Nhiệt tình giúp tìm nhà xe từ Mèo Vạc qua Cao Bằng.....
skvělá lokalita, snídaně a velmi ochotný personál!

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Camera molto spaziosa e pulita. Purtroppo al lato stavano costruendo un edificio . Noi siamo arrivati alle 15 stanchi e non abbiamo potuto riposare ma il vero problema è che alle 21 continuavano a spaccare muri e distruggere con sbarre di ferro. Alle nostre lamentele i 2 giovani ragazzi ci trasferivano di fronte ad un bel hotel Friends dove. On abbiamo avuto la colazione ma almeno dormito in pace visto che i lavori iniziavano alle 5 del mattino. Quindi bravi e gentili i due ragazzi forse non dovevano vendere la camera ma visto che è anche ostello non ci hanno pensato. Non è vicino al centro ma le agenzie di noleggio scooter sono a poche decine di metri.

review.rating: Super affordable hotel with friendly staff.
review.comment_positive:
Was great value for money. Secure parking for motorbike and super friendly hosts. 

Room was very large and had choice of which one we preferred. Had view over the street. 

Had complimentary water machine to fill bottles.

The Ha Giang tour with driver Minh. It was the most amazing experience. Minh and the drivers were extremely caring, energetic and fun. They made the trip so comfortable and memorable. Highly recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Hotel is fine. Not much around and nothing spectacular but as a night before / after Ha Giang loop it was good. Rooms are spacious and very clean, so big plus. Also good breakfast!
review.comment_negative: The ‘mountain view’ rooms overlook a chicken family.. The roosters are really horrible. The lower to the ground the more you feel one with the pack. Definitely recommend bringing ear plugs.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_negative: We hebben twee nachten bij dit hostel geboekt, voor en na de Ha Giang Loop. De kamer was vies en slecht onderhouden. Tijdens het douchen wordt de hele badkamer zeiknat. Het personeel is super onaardig en totaal niet behulpzaam. Toen wij om 7 uur de bus moesten hebben, wilden ze geen ontbijt regelen, omdat dit pas om 7.30 uur begint. Het ontbijt is daarnaast erg karig (slechts een broodje ei), geen opties voor drinken. De eigenaar is ongeïnteresseerd en heeft totaal geen aandacht voor zijn gasten. Bespaar jezelf de frustratie en boek hier niet!

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: établissement incroyable, le personnel est adorable, les chambres sont propres et avec tout le confort possible. Le petit déjeuner est très bien, sandwich à l’omelette et pastèque. Nous recommandons vivement.

review.rating: awesome hostel with a great balcony and nice rooms.
review.comment_positive: Great place to start the ha giang loop. The owner was very helpful organizing a tour for me. They also gave me a bike to practice on the first day I was there.
Good place. Comfortable rooms. Kind staff. Would repeat for sure!

review.rating: Book your Ha Giang tour with this place!
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: We had the best 3D2N tour with these guys! They looked after us so well from start to finish, keeping us safe, we’ll fed and entertained the whole time (and the weather didn’t make that easy). My tour guide and easy rider were both so friendly and made me feel so comfortable about an experience I was super anxious about before we started and I have to say it’s one of the greatest things I’ve ever done. Couldn’t recommend these guys enough! (If you’re fussy with food like me, they do put on enough of a spread that you will always have something to eat but I would recommend bringing snacks like chocolate and crisps just in case, my boyfriend really enjoyed all the food but I can be a pain as I don’t eat noodles or egg). The home stays are basic but comfortable and you always have a warm shower at the end of the day, you can pay extra for a private room too if you’re travelling as a couple. A super special thank you to Hinh for making this trip so special and for teaching us how to drink happy water like a pro!
review.comment_negative: Breakfast at the hostel wasn’t to my taste as I didn’t like eggs and this was the only option.

review.rating: Really great tour, only the hostels during the tour can be optimized.
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
The hostel in Ha Giang was simple but perfect: clean + comfy.
The motorbike tour (we took easy riders) was so good because of our drivers, who not only drove us super safe but were funny and kind and helped us with everything during our tour. They worked super hard and I just hope they get paid well. Tour was super organized, very professional.
review.comment_negative: Only thing we didnt like was the hostel we stayed in during the HaGiang loop (Aladdin Homestay in Dong Van). It was noisy (party until late in the night), not the cleanest, and we didn’t like the food.

review.comment_positive: zij organiseerde de ha giang loop voor ons. dit hebben ze geweldig gedaan! het personeel was erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam en alles was goed georganiseerd! Ook de motors waren goed en ze hebben meerdere type (schakel en semi automaat).
review.comment_negative: het hostel zelf was ook prima. we hadden alleen geen warm water in de kamer. over het algemeen verblijf je daar een nacht om vervolgens de loop te rijden en daarvoor is het zeer geschikt.

review.rating: The trip was very, very well organized. The tour leader, Hinh knew exactly where to go and how to ge
review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Bữa sáng tuyệt vời với dưa hấu, thành Long, chuối, trà và cafe cùng bánh mì trứng với vở nhìn ra núi tuyệt vời

Parfait !

Les chambres sont spacieuses, les lits confortables et le ménage impeccable !

Le petit déjeuner est très bon et le service rapide.

Le logement est proche de gare routière, pratique si vous arrivez en bus.

Nous avons loué un scooter pour faire seuls une boucle de 260 km autour de Ha Giang sur 2 jours pour aller vers Yen Minh. Tout s'est très bien passé ! 

Nous recommandons cet hôtel !

review.rating: Perfect hostel before the Ha Giang Loop
review.comment_positive:
A fantastic hostel with great staff who were ever so
helpful when we were preparing to do the Ha Giang Loop. They kindly gave us free lessons on the semi-automatic bikes, took us to a nearby waterfall, and offered free breakfast before we set out to do the loop. The motorbikes were reasonably priced to rent, and I suggest getting insurance as there is always a possibility of something going wrong with the bikes. 
Hotel room was very clean and comfortable.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Bike rentals were okay - my dad's bike was a bit old and broke down, mine was the xr150 and was a dream, a bit of luck of the draw but most looked in good condition. Room was nice. Good for a night.
review.comment_negative: Roosters make a bit of noise, as do a few cats and dogs round the area

review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ đáp ứng kì vọng
review.comment_negative: Phòng không có máy sấy tóc. Nước nóng hơi ít với người tắm tốn nước, phải chờ để tắm tiếp

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Giường hơi nhỏ so với nhu cầu nhưng sạch sẽ và mọi thứ ngăn nắp.
They gave us motorbikes, talked to us about the route, rain protection for us and our backpack and took care of everything we needed. Great location to start and stop ha giang loop from.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive:
The reception staff was kind lovely and helpful.
Clean and tidy room.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: It was good! Didn't expect that from a hostel. The room was very luxurious considering this being a hostel. The bathroom was nice as well and we did get some breakfast too. The hostel is not in the city centre, but it's near everything that you need. It's surrounded by other hostels and homestays.
review.comment_negative: Only thing is that they don't offer fresh coffee, thats it.

review.comment_positive: Pretty good place, a bit on the outskirts of Ha Giang

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Nice and big, the dorm was spacious, there were enough showers and bathrooms. The free breakfast was nice and on a high floor. This is the spot to go before you do your ha giang loop.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn nhỏ xinh và sạch sẽ ngăn nắp. Chủ nhà cũng dễ gần, mình đi một mình nên cũng đỡ buồn.

review.rating: tour guide Minh & his teams were nice & friendly, good experience with them, strongly recommend
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: clean & good place to stay
Great hostel, nice rooms with comfy beds!
review.comment_negative: The hostel is like an echo chamber and very loud - we were continuously woken up by other loud guests throughout the night and early in the morning. There was zero soundproofing sadly.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Honestly - great. 
Accom - very clean. Easy to get to from bus. Polite English speaking staff. Wifi very good. 
Ended up renting bikes here too. We were so lucky to arrive the day they received a new bike delivery! 4km in the odometer. No issues around the whole loop (so can’t say I’ve tested their services if things go wrong…)
Read a lot of reviews around town about places ignoring/being rude if you just wanted to hire a bike instead of join an easy rider tour…. This place paid us attention without being pushy - great vibe - no regrets about renting from here!
They also let us have a shower (and borrow towels) before getting back on the bus. Thank you!
review.comment_negative: Room was a little bit stuffy (like the previous guest had been a smoker) but not bad. But 100% clean.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Room is clean. I was happy here.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Staff was helpfull planning the motorbike trip
review.comment_negative: Not so many places for dinner at walking distance

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Comfortable place to stay before setting off on the loop. Private rooms are clean. The owner can help you organise tours, easy rider and motor bikes for the loop. His easy rider staff were outstanding and professional.
review.comment_negative: It's a bit far from town so not many options for places to eat and no grocery shop nearby. The window next to the bed is annoying. No toilet paper provided in the bathroom.

review.rating: excellent stay for 1 night in ha giang
review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: warm shower, clean rooms, central location

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Giường êm nệm ấm và wifi trâu

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_negative: Wir haben das teuerste Motorrad ausgeliehen und am ersten Tag sind wir damit zweimal liegen geblieben, wodurch wir 3 Stunden länger für die erste Strecke gebraucht haben. Bei knapp 40°C in knallender Sonne keine angenehme Erfahrung. Für die restlichen Tage haben wir ein neues Motorrad bekommen, das einwandfrei funktioniert hat.

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Very friendly and helpful people! Clean rooms und the AC also works very well. The Rooftop is a gift for your visit at this place!
Really good money for value

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: motoren die gehuurd konden worden
review.comment_negative: beperkt ontbijt. Vandaag alleen 2 droge toast boterhammen waar we wat honing op konden doen. geen boter, geen thee. wel lekker fruit

review.comment_positive: Phòng gọn gàng, sạch sẽ. Phù hợp cho một chuyến công tác ngắn ngày.

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive: 房間乾淨，位置在巴士站旁，早餐好吃
review.comment_negative: 沐浴用品是拋棄式的，廁所沒衛生紙，周遭餐廳選項少

review.comment_positive: Beautiful clean rooms! Great staff, owner speaks very good English! Very good breakfast included.
review.comment_negative: It's a small walk to the city center.

review.rating: Lugar perfecto para empezar y terminar el ha giang loop
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: El hostal es un 10 para lo que buscas en ha giang. La habitación es amplia y limpia, con camas cómodas y baño completo. La ubicación es buena, cerca de la estación de autobuses. Desayuno con pocas opciones (es así en casi todos los sitios) pero bueno. Puedes alquilar moto por tu cuenta o con chofer para hacer el ha giang loop. Punto a favor también es que cuando terminas, puedes ducharte para seguir tu viaje, aunque ya no tengas habitación. Te regalan además una camiseta. Se supone que es si haces el tour con ellos, pero al final te la dan 😉
review.comment_negative: Nada

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Con gái đi solo may được các anh chị hostel hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, nhiều kỷ niệm đẹp.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: El hostel está un poco apartado del centro de la ciudad pero se está bien y tranquilo. Habitaciones igual que en las fotos, muy cómodas. Personal muy atento y agradable. fueron muy flexibles y nos cambiaron sin problema la reserva que hicimos (llegamos a las 4 am de la mañana). También alquilamos el servicio de motos con ellos, buena calidad precio.

review.rating: Perfekte Ausgangslage für den Ha Giang Loop
review.comment_positive:
Das Hostel ist der Ideale Ausgangspunkt für den Ha Giang Loop. Das Zimmer war sehr sauber und die Mitarbeiter zuvorkommend. 

Wir haben den Scooter direkt beim Hostel gemietet, was sehr unkompliziert war. Vor der Abreise haben wir eine tolle Instruktion erhalten, damit wir uns sicher fühlten. Man merkt, dass ihnen das Wohlergehen der Gäste sehr wichtig ist.

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Très beau rooftop. Chambres confortables.

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: The staff were beautifully friendly and the authentic. Good location. Clean room.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể

review.comment_positive:
We just did the 4 days Ha Giang Loop tour with the Ha Giang Hostel team, and it was the most scenic and most memorable part of our trip in Vietnam! The views are breathtaking and the people very welcoming. Minh was our guide, along with Cuong and Khoa riding our bikes. They were super friendly and we partied together every night while learning some Vietnamese! Minh was very good with planning the trip so we avoided most of the crowds of other tourists that we could see at some spots. The 4 days tour is really worth it, as you get to see a lot more instead of just rushing back on the last day. We’re traveling with our 10 year old son, and Minh was like a big brother to him! 
By the way, the hostel itself is clean and comfortable!
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
Piękny domek z cudownym widokiem.
Miły i pomocny personel.
El personal, muy amables, nos organizaron el tour con moto por las montañas de Ha Giang. Nos guardaron la mochila grande. Muy dispuestos a ayudar en todo. La terraza de arriba muy mona :).

Friendly staff who offered any help needed
Very clean hostel in general
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast was quite basic
Make sure you book a room with window (we had one without)

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Phòng tương đối ổn, sạch sẽ. Nhân viên lịch sự, thân thiện.

Super preis Leistungsverhältnis. Alles war sauber und sehr modern/ neu. Check in klappte reibungslos, Check-out ebenso. Es werden Touren und Motorräder zur Leihe angeboten. Zu der Tour kann ich allerdings nichts sagen, da ich mit einer anderen Company gebucht hatte und nur die Nacht vorher hier verbracht habe. Dusche hat super funktioniert, Bett war bequem, AC lief leise und gut über Nacht. Frühstück war nicht herausragend, aber ok und der Ausblick hat es definitiv aufgewertet! Restaurants für ein verspätetes Abendessen oder einen Drink sind gegenüber bzw. in der Nähe.
review.comment_negative: Wir hatten ein Zimmer mit „Blick auf den Hinterhof“ gebucht, weshalb wir dachten, dass da auch ein Fenster drin sein wird. Das „Fenster“ führte in den Fahrstuhlschacht und ließ sich dementsprechend nicht öffnen und auch kein Tageslicht ins Zimmer.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Superb banh mi breakfast, very quick to respond to messages. Had zero issues checking in at 2am.
Clean and spacious rooms.
Hôtel très agréable

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Choisissez bien une chambre avec fenêtre et de préférence vue sur la rue. La chambre vue jardin était trop humide, donc nous avons demandé à changer. La nouvelle chambre était parfaite, propre, fonctionnelle. La salle de bain était propre également. Vous pouvez laisser votre sac pendant la loop.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Perfect om even te overnachten voor of na de Ha Giang Loop. We boekten die bij hen en ons verblijf was dan gratis. Heel goedkoop dus hadden geen hoge verwachtingen. Kamer is oké. Ontbijt simpel maar ook oké.
review.comment_negative: Schimmel in douche. Licht in raam dat van achter de lift kwam.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Phòng rộng rãi thoáng.
Chủ nhà thân thiện,
Ở đây có kèm dịch vụ thuê xe

review.rating: Best way to start your trip in Ha Giang!
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Clean and spacious room. New furniture and amenities. Very friendly staff. Awesome caffe on the roof. Great place to stay!
habitación muy cómoda y limpia. recepción 24h. Tienen servicio de alquiler de motos y te aconsejan sobre el loop.
review.comment_negative: nada

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: The staff was friendly and the hostel has good conditions. The room was clean and the AC worked good.
review.comment_negative: The room was supposed to have a mountain view and that was not the case. Also, breakfast was just an omelet inside some bread, which was quite basic.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Es war alles sehr sauber und auch das Mehrbettzimmer sehr geräumig. Wir haben hier auch unsere Roller für 3 Tage self-drive Ha Giang Loop gemietet und eine hilfreiche Einführung bekommen. das Personal war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit auch beim buchen der Busse nach/von Ha Giang.

Chambre double très propre et très confortable
Beaucoup d'attention : serviettes, gel douche, shampooing, brosse à dents, coton tige, peigne, rasoir

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Via dit hostel hebben wij de 4 daagse motortour gedaan. Een van ons met een easyrider en een van ons heeft zelf gereden op een Honda XR 150 (zeker aan te raden als je zelf gaat rijden!). Wij hebben fantastische ervaring gehad met de groep. De easyriders waren zeer ervaren en lief. Wij zijn voor ons gevoel op wat ‘ruigere’ plekken geweest dan de normale route. Bij uitstek onze favoriete ervaring van ons onze reis door Vietnam. De groep was klein (circa 12 mensen) maar erg gezellig.
review.comment_negative: Wij hebben voor private rooms gekozen tijdens de motortocht. Helaas was de kamer tijdens onze tweede nacht erg gehorig.

The staffs are all the best all very kind I don’t remember all their names sorry I only know Mr. Viet (very nice guy) but all of them in the Hostel are super kind helpful and gives a smile all the time. The rooms are cheap very comfortable and the view at the breakfast area is a preview of what you will have in the Hagiang Loop. I recommend this place 101%

review.comment_negative: The owner was friendly, except was very pushy about renting motorbikes from him for the loop, even though we already had rented bikes elsewhere. Gave us the cold shoulder a bit once we didn’t rent from him.

review.comment_positive: Thé hostel is immaculate and the staff were amazing, they helped us with everything from motorbike rental to planning our route on the loop and the owner was available during the loop for any issues encountered. We had a brilliant stay. The breakfast was included and was delicious. Thank you so much!

review.comment_positive: Stayed one night on either side of my Ha Giang loop ride. The room was immaculately clean. Staff were lovely. Excellent water pressure and the water was HOT. Basic toiletries provided. Breakfast was delicious. Perfectly fine for a night or two. I was so happy to have a real hot shower after completing the loop.
review.comment_negative: While breakfast was delicious, some other options would be nice. It’s an omelette on a baguette and some fresh fruit - that’s all. There were teacups in the room but no kettle or tea/coffee. Whilst the room was VERY clean, there was quite a strong musty smell. But it was a perfectly comfortable stay.

review.rating: Nice place for a cheap price
review.comment_positive: We stayed in this hostel because of the Ha Giang Loop. The hostel was located near the bus station (we arrived from Hanoi) and was not in the city center of Ha Giang, which we liked. There are a couple of restaurants on the other side of the road, which is more than sufficient when you need to get up early to start the tour. The hostel was clean, check-in went smoothly and we rented a nice motorbike for a good price. Breakfast was simple but tasty. Beds were nice and the room was clean!
review.comment_negative: They wanted us to leave our passport as a deposit for the motorbike, but that is against Vietnamese rules. We finally agreed on leaving one of our driver license there.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive:
This place you are definitely booking for the service you get regarding the loop itself rather than the accomodation. The owner was super helpful in organising motorbikes and telling us about logistics. He made dealing with checkpoints a complete breeze. As we were hiring motorbikes for 5 days for the loop anyways they included one day free for exploring ha giang city. They also allowed us to shower after the loop before our bus. I can’t fault their service for the loop.

Also organised a bus to cao bang for me. Definitely listen to his warnings about the quality of the ride lol.

Breakfast was egg banh mi with optional sausage. Lovely view from the communal area.
review.comment_negative:
Hot water was a bit hard to start using the first time. The worst part though was that the dorm had quite a strong moldy smell that was clearly covered up using paint.

The private room I booked afterwards was excellent though so I can definitely recommend that.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Accueil au top. Toujours quelqu un de disponible et réveillé. Nous avons loué deux motos pour faire la loop et c était génial. Nous avons pu laisser nos sacs à l hôtel le temps de faire le trajet. Le rooftop est très sympa et en face vous trouverez un petit restaurant de pâtes correct. La chambre est impeccable. Rien à redire. Encore merci à la personne de l accueil qui nous a toujours aidé, peu importe la demande 😊

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Had a great experience at the hostel also doing the the Ha Giang loop through them. The riders were fantastic and very friendly. Staff treated us extremely well also. Met great people, had great food and enjoyed the best sceneries of my life. 10/10 would recommend.
review.comment_negative: nothing!

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Das Personal war sehr nett und hat uns bei der Planung unserer Route geholfen. Danach wussten wir in welchen Dörfern wir übernachten werden und welche Strecken wir besser vermeiden sollten. Unser Gepäck konnten wir in der Lobby lagern und am Ende des Trips auch eine Dusche im Untergeschoss nehmen. Das Moped haben wir auch direkt über das Hostel geliehen (ohne Versicherung 400k pro Tag) und auch damit war alles okay.
review.comment_negative: Das einzige was wir nicht verstanden haben, war dass wir bei Abgabe unserer internationalen Führerscheins aufgefordert wurden eine Bestätigung übers Internet anzufordern, die uns 35 Doller kosten sollte, da die Klasse A1 nicht angekreuzt war. Auf mehrfaches Nachfragen hin, bekamen wir aber trotzdem das Mopped ausgeliehen. Es sollte uns lt. der Mitarbeiterin nur zum Schutz vor der Polizei dienen. Wir haben uns gegen dieses Zertifikat entschieden und waren nach 5 Minuten in einer Polizeikontrolle ohne Probleme! Das Zertifikat braucht man nach unserer Einschätzung also nicht.

review.comment_positive: From organising our 3n 4 day trip they were terrific. I would highly recommend any one doing the loop to organise it through these guys... they only have a Smaller group of only 10 for this loop.. which is great as you get to meet others... near new bikes and Guides 3 of them were fantastic Ahn leader was great  good English. When we got back they organised bus tickets back to hanoi as we were pretty stuffed of having 3 nights of having fun..
review.comment_negative: Having to hand the bikes back... also other hostels have too bigger group which you don't want...

review.comment_negative:
Difficile de comprendre comment il peut il y avoir autant de bonnes notes sur cet établissement. 
On nous a arnaqué de A à Z sur les prestations proposés. On nous a dit que c'était impossible de louer une moto sans permis moto international car il y a pleins de contrôle de police sois disant (on ne verra aucun contrôle pendant notre séjour de 4 jours).
Donc le gars de la réception nous a limite forcé de prendre des easy driver, nous avons donc payé la formule all inclusive, bien plus cher évidemment. Puis lors du premier jour de notre tour nos driver nous demandent de payer leur déjeuner, leur hôtel  et leur carburant! on appelle donc l'hostel qui comme par hasard ne comprends plus du tout l'anglais. Après une heure de négociation, l'hostel nous dit qu'on peut rejoindre le groupe pour le même tarif, du grand n'importe quoi, mais c'était soit ça soit on rentrait à Hanoï.
Bref un séjour gâché par cet établissement avec un personnel très malhonnête,

Un conseil, ne faîtes pas les tours chez eux, ils sont deux fois plus chers qu'ailleurs et pas forcément meilleur.

review.rating: THE place to go in Ha Giang - highly recommended!
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
We, my partner and I, stayed here twice, upon arrival and departure of our 4-day bike tour on the loop, and would definitely return and recommend to everyone looking for an amazing spot in Ha Giang.

We arrived in the middle of the night (4 am) via Sleeper Bus and booked the prior night in the Two-Bedroom with Mountain View - check-in was super smooth. The room was very clean, smelt good, had a modern taste and mountain view ;-) The hostel is not located in the middle of Ha Giang city, which is very good. Still, you get to the city by foot in just a few mins.

We booked our motorbikes directly on-site - 5 days with insurance and a good introduction into semi-automatic. Hemelts are provided. After a day of practice, we drove off into the unknown by our own (tours are offered) ;-)

Breakfast is served at the rooftop - if you are lucky and catch the tables next to the railing, you will enjoy a beautiful view. Next to fruits and coffee / tea, you are served Bánh mì with an omelette - perfect to start into the day!

The owner is THE man to organize EVERYTHING! :-) May it be an issue on the road with the bike, a private driver to Sapa (the best we had in Vietnam) or if you forget something at the hostel (he sent a driver to our next destination to bring it to us at no add. cost - thank you so much again!). Of course, the whole staff is very, very friendly :-) With this kind of safety in the back, you do not need to worry about anything!

We will definitely return!

General hint: Make sure to bring your International Driver License and the national one if you want to drive on your own (you will meet police on the loop asking for BOTH).

review.rating: Sleep here before you Ha Giang loop;)
review.comment_positive: The staff is very nice and speaks wonderful English. They help you throughout booking of everything you need: Ha Giang loops, bike rentals, bus transfers and more. The price is very cheap and the hostel very nice, with laundry service as well.

review.rating: geweldig! beste hotel voor ha giang loop
review.comment_positive: geweldig hostel. de kamers zijn prima, simpel maar daar betaal je ook naar. de eigenaar helpt je met alles. ze hebben motets voor de ha giang loop en kunnen ook je helpen met de bussen naar Hanoi of andere bestemmingen. wij hadden een vroege bus maar ze maakte toch nog snel ontbijt

review.comment_positive: Rapporto qualità/prezzo ottimo. Hotel scelto per la vicinanza ad ottimi negozi di noleggio moto, quindi buona base di partenza per il Loop. Colazione sul tetto semplice ma ottima.
review.comment_negative: Per una stanza senza finestra verso l'esterno l'aria condizionata era un po' scadente.

review.comment_positive:
L'emplacement de l'hébergement très pratique pour louer chez QT a côté !
La chambre est confortable.
On a eu droit à une réduction étant donné que des groupes de personnes ont été bruyants la nuit, un geste commercial que nous avons apprécié.
review.comment_negative: L'humidité de la salle de bain, aucune évacuation de l'humidité

review.rating: L'hotel non è male, le moto sono orrende.
review.comment_positive: La stanza era pulita e i letti comodi.
review.comment_negative: Le ragazze alla reception non sono state così gentili, molto svogliate, al contrario dei ragazzi che sono stati  gentili e disponibili. Nella nostra stanza al primo piano c'era un perenne odore di muffa che anche con il condizionatore su dry, non siamo riusciti a togliere. Le moto 150 che abbiamo noleggiato per l'ha Giang Loop ci ha fatto passare 3 giorni di ansia perché non eravamo sicuri avesse retto fino alla fine, delle 3 che ci hanno proposto Le prime 2 erano in pessime condizioni, una non restava accesa e l'altra ballava la ruota ed è rimasta senza benzina letteralmente 150m dopo che siamo partiti. La terza e ultima che dovevamo per forza prendere continuava a fare rumori strani e aveva sia problemi di carburazione che di trasmissione, e ogni mattina prima di ripartire abbiamo passato 10minuti a tentare di accenderla, per il prezzo di 550'000/day si può trovare molto di meglio. Nemmeno il portatelefono per poter guardare la mappa mentre si viaggia. Abbiamo preferito rientrare un giorno prima per non rischiare di rimanere a piedi in mezzo alle montagne.

review.rating: Hostel Stay that feels more like a Hotel. Great Value for your Money and Wonderful Staff!
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
We stayed at Ha Giang Hostel after arriving in Ha Giang to stay at another place. Our original place was loud and dirty so we called and took a taxi to Ha Giang Hostel. As soon as we arrived, we knew this place was much better. The whole property is clean and comfortable. The rooms were clean and everything worked well. There was an aircon and fan in the room and the private bathroom was clean and offered all needed amenities. 

The staff was super friendly and welcoming and made sure that we had everything we needed. After seeing how nice the property and staff were - we actually decided to book our Ha Giang Loop trip through Ha Giang Hostel instead of our original company. We were so glad we did and kept saying that everything works out for a reason.

The breakfast was also nice!
review.comment_negative: Everything was perfect!

review.comment_positive: Esta muy limpio y tranquilo. El desayuno está muy bueno.

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường

review.comment_positive: Ze beiden onvergetelijke ha hiang loop aan met fantastische easy riders. Bieden ook veel services aan. Na de loop mag je nog douchen voor je verder reist. Kamers zijn basic maar prima. Ontbijt is top!
review.comment_negative: De accommodaties bij de loop zijn niet heel top. De nachtbus naar Cat Ba die ik via hen heb geboekt was echt een nachtmerrie. De bus van Sapa naar Ha Giang daarentegen wel top!

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
The room is clean and the furniture is new 
The owner is very helpful
You can leave your bag and take a small one in the loop 
Everything is great 👍

review.rating: Great quality clean hostel with fantastic Ha Giang tour options
review.comment_positive: Great location English speaking reception and excellent choice of routes for the Ha Giang Loop and maximum group tour  size of 10 with all options of new motorcycles 🏍️ available with guides and easy riders
review.comment_negative: Good food on the tour ,but could do with more variety as lunch and dinners all quite similar

review.comment_positive: I could not recommend this hostel enough!! The staff at Ha Giang hostel were nothing but friendly, helpful and supportive of us with our check in in the middle of the night, motorbike rental and our journey around the Ha Giang loop. They had clear pricing, maps and advice to offer. They even helped us with our dinner choice when we returned and with the arrangements for our next destination! The breakfast that was included was also a delicious banh my that set us up for the day. The property also has an elevator which was a bonus!
review.comment_negative: Nothing- all was great!!

review.comment_positive: Pleasant stay

Super Unterkunft um den Loop zu starten. Viele Informationen und den Roller kann man direkt ausleihen, so wie nicht benötigtes Gepäck temporär verstauen. Das Frühstück ist rudimentär aber ausreichend und inklusive
review.comment_negative: Eine vorgeschlagene Route war voller Schotter und kaum befahrbar, die Strecke wären wir so nicht nach Du Gia gefahren. Ansonsten waren sie sehr hilfreich.

review.rating: Alles top und sehr freundlicher Service, sogar spontane um Buchung des Zimmers ging noch.

review.comment_positive: velmi nápomocný personál, lze rovnou vypůjčit motorky, lze vyprat prádlo, při výběru dávejte pozor na to zda je pokoj s oknem či nikoli. Doporučili nám na snídani jiný podnik kousek od ubytování, kde lze sehnat vajíčka k snídani (omeletu). V blízkosti přes ulici je super místní restaurace. Dobrý start na Ha Giang Loop.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi

The name Hostel, I thought I would be in a room with other people but to my surprise its a nice room with a nice shower, basically just like a hotel room

Voor de prijs kun je niet beter krijgen! Communicatie fijn, inchecken was zelfs mogelijk midden in de nacht (4:00 am), schone kamer, ontbijt erbij, regelen ook ha giang loop tours (wij hadden groep van 7 personen dus mega fijn) en achteraf zelfs nog een shirt van de ha giang loop tour gekregen. Ook regelde ze vervoer van en naar het hostel naar volgende/vorige bestemming.
review.comment_negative: Niks

review.rating: Very nice hostel and excellent easyrider/tourguide Minh
review.comment_positive: I had one good night in the hostel and three fantastic days during the Ha Giang Loop with Minh as a tourguide and driver! Wonderfull trip and I enjoyed it very much, I will recommend it to everybody who wants to experience the HGL to do it with Ha Giang Hostel; everything was perfect arranged also the Homestays on the trip were very kind! I’d loved it!

The room ia suitable for a night
If you are traveling and need to sleep in a clean place this is a good choice

review.rating: Básico, para estar una noche y hacer el tour. No lo recomendaría
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: No me gustó nada, pero, por el error de la cancelación de la reserva nos ofrecieron rebajas en el precio del alquiler de motos.
review.comment_negative: Reservamos una noche con la intencion de alquilar motos al dia siguiente para hacer el tour por nuestra cuenta. Avisamos que llegábamos de madrugada y al llegar, nos dieron una habitacion enana q no era la q habiamos reservado. Resultó q nos habían cancelado la reserva. Es verdad q al reclamar por la mañana pagamos lo correspondiente a la habitacion q nos dieron y nos ofrecieron precios más baratos para las motos. Al final, no alquilamos la moto con ellos porque no teníamos el carnet internacional de moto, que es necesario, y las opciones que te ofrecen son...cuestionables. El desayuno, básico, con café soluble (con el buen cafe q hay en Vietnam!!) y mala bolleria, aunque te puedes comer un bocata de tortilla recien hecha. Es un hotel de paso para estar una noche y alquilar ahí el tour. Alejado del centro.

review.rating: Good stay for a night. clean, modern and spacious.
review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Really clean, modern, nice hostel. Nice for one night stay. breakfast was fast and good, rooftop was pretty. beds were pretty spacious and comfy. if you get lucky you might be able to get the double bed (looked like one per dorm room). it has an elevator which is really nice.
review.comment_negative: Could stand to have more bathrooms per floor. 2 showers and 2 toilets per floor when there are multiple dorm rooms on one floor isn’t really enough. the toilets were clogged when i was there too, so that was difficult. the staff fixed it quickly in the morning though. there was no hand soap at the sinks - had to borrow body wash from the shower.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
We booked the 4 day Ha Giang Loop Tour and we can highly recommend it! If you dont do it, you will miss out!! 
The Tour was well organized, and although it is a Hard loop to drive, we felt safe all the time. The drivers are very nice and friendly and we had a really great time! 
Especially our guide Minh did an exceptional Job at taking care of us, led us to the most stunning views we have ever experienced, leading our Group safe and sound, respected our wishes, Speaking english very well  and making lots of Funny Jokes. 
Our drivers Minh and Tung did a great Job!
review.comment_negative: Everything was really great

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Spacious place.

review.comment_negative: On a pris le bus de nuit pour Ninh Binh avec eux car  c’était plus facile pour nous. cependant, nous avons appris qu’ils nous ont arnaqué avec le prix car la plupart des gens dans le bus avaient paye 100000 vend de moins voir plus. nous ne recommandons pas d’acheter les billets avec eux.

review.comment_positive: Le personnel était de très bons conseils pour un départ sur la loop d'Ha Giang. Ils gardent et prennent soin de vos affaires pendant votre absence. Si vous êtes jeune et que vous voyagez seuls, commencez votre séjour ici car il est idéal pour faire des rencontres !

review.comment_positive: le rapport qualité prix est assez bon
review.comment_negative:
Le responsable nous a réservé un bus, on se pointe à l’heure exacte pas de bus 
Finalement il nous dit que le bus et en panne et qu’il n’y en a pas d’autres, il voit qu’on est vraiment vraiment dans le pétrain et n’a en aucun cas cherché à nous aider 
Résultat nous deux malades à crever on a du se démener a chercher des homestay proposant un service de bus et le premier nous a confirmé il y avait pleins de bus dans la journée

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive:
El hostel és confortable y limpio.

El loop fue la mejor experiència del viaje en vietnam, Lo mas destacable; Van, Minth y el resto de guias e easy riders són personas increïbles, divertidos y amables, se preucupan por tu bienestar en todo momento y te hacen disfrutar al maximo de la experiencia. Si haces el loop, pon en valor el trabajo incansable de esos chicos.

Hicimos el loop a la inversa visitando sitios inesperados que nos encantaron. Los alojamientos y las comidas fueron familiares, acojedoras y riquissimas.

Buenas motos y en perfecto estado.
review.comment_negative:
Solo el hecho que en el hostel nos obligaron a sacar un permiso Internacional de conducir de UK a los que ibamos sin easy rider, permiso para nada oficial pero que la policia accepta como valido. 
Mientras que otro chico Asiatico le ahorraron los 30€ que valia este tramite, estando los easy riders al Caso de los controles de policia i contratando por 1€ un conductor para passar solo el control.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: The staff is perfect 👍

Nice Hostel with great Bikes for the Ha Giang Loop, we got a new 2022 Honda Blade Model. After we finished the Loop we were allowed to take a shower and even got new towels... Excellent Service to a reasonable price

review.rating: great stop to base yourselves for ha giang pre and post best hostel I have stayed in Asia.
review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: best hostel I’ve stayed in Asia. helpful front desk spotless clean bathrooms and bed area. bunk beds comfy. hired bikes got a map and route guidance and onward coach all sorted through accom reception all at great prices. bike was really good quality for ha giang loop heard horror story’s from others we met along the way at the end who rented from elsewhere. host went above and beyond to get us on the night bus the evening we got back rather than conning us into another night stay super helpful even dropped us to the buss last stop so we could make it in time. yummy breakfast on top floor also. plenty of hot water in showers free soaps and plenty of toilet roll. sent off on night bus with free large bottles of water each which was a nice touch ! would recommend only staying here a lot of others said there accom was rather run down in ha giang this looks all brand new ! also can store your bags here free of charge during the loop and any bags you take with you they provide straps you attach to the bike on day one.
review.comment_negative: would say maybe rather than boiling bed sheets even though smelt clean using some scented fabric conditioner might be a nice touch so you feel great when you get in the bed and no danger of having to do the sniff test to check it’s clean as everyone does in hostels haha

review.comment_positive: bed was comfy.
review.comment_negative: got stuck here while a hurricane was hitting my hometown, wifi barely worked which is incredibly frustrating while I was waiting to hear if my family survived. no toliet paper, had to ask. no window in room except one leading to the stairwell which had very loud people in it early morn. staff were strange and not always available.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: the ja giang loop Tour they offered was exceptionally!! the guides were so lovely and did an amazing job! 10/10 would recommend to go with them on the at least 3D2N tour. it was fun, it was exciting, it was beautiful! we enjoyed it to the fullest and the loop has been our Vietnam highlight so far.
review.comment_negative: room was ok. nothing special, but we also only stayed overnight, so nothing to complain.

review.comment_positive: Very clean and nice room
review.comment_negative: The staff couldn't speak english but he was very nice, we used google translation and everything went fine

review.rating: Great hostel to start the Ha Giang Loop
review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive: Zimmer waren immer klimatisiert, große Betten mit Vorhängen und flauschiger Decke. Ich bin um 5.00 morgens mit dem Overnight Bus aus Hanoi angekommen und konnte ohne Probleme einchecken. Sehr nettes Personal, gutes Frühstück. Ich hatte den Loop alleine gefahren ohne Gruppe und mir wurde sehr gut geholfen mit dem Motorrad, Route, Tipps für die Fahrt. Es war kein Problem das Motorrad einen Tag später abzugeben wenn man länger für den Loop braucht. Gepäck kann kostenlos untergestellt werden während dem Trip. Unbedingt seinen internationalen Führerschein dabei haben, da dies vor Anmietung des Motorrads kontrolliert wird.
review.comment_negative: Es gab kein Toilettenpapier bei den Toiletten im 5. Stockwerk

review.comment_positive: Great place to rest before our Loop! Very new and clean, we were super satisfied :)

Het personeel is vriendelijk. We hebben er een motor gehuurd voor onze trip naar de Ha Giang loop. Onze backpacks mochten we achterlaten in het hostel. Daarnaast kregen we korting op de kamer. 
Het personeel is erg flexibel en toen we de motor een dag eerder wilden inleveren (na 4 dagen) omdat we de loop sneller deden was dit geen enkel probleem, ondanks dat we een contract hadden voor 5 dagen. 
Helaas was er toen we terugkwamen van de loop geen prive kamer meer beschikbaar, anders waren we nog een nachtje gebleven.
review.comment_negative:
Het ontbijt is vrij simpel, een broodje ei. 
De badkamer is niet erg schoon

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể

review.rating: perfekt um den Ha Giang Loop zu starten

review.comment_negative: -wir hatten beide Male kein Toilettenpapier auf dem Zimmer

review.comment_positive: Kurzfristiger Wäscheservice über Nacht, da wir spät dort ankamen. Frühstück auf der Roof top Terrasse. Alles war sehr sauber. Ganz wichtig: Fahrstuhl! :D

review.comment_positive: Khách sạn có vị trí khá ổn, phòng ốc sạch sẽ. Nhân viên lễ tân nhiệt tình.

Great breakfast and very helpful staff. Perfect place to start the Ha Giang loop.

review.rating: Amazing tour with this hostel! BOOK THROUGH THE HOSTEL💛

We booked via WhatsApp and everything was set up for us when we checked in. The tour guides were fab and we had the most amazing four days! 

Shout out to our faves Minh,khoa,Chung,Quan🫶🏻
rapport qualité/prix top. chambre extrêmement propre pour le prix, c’est appréciable !

De Ha Giang Loop start voor het hostel.
Ontbijt was prima.
review.comment_negative: Ze lieten ons een internationaal rijbewijs kopen waarvan de datum niet goed was. Gelukkig geen last van gehad tijdens de controles

review.comment_positive: Aardige en behulpzame mensen! Heerlijk bed en na terugkomst van de motorbike tocht konden we douchen en wachten op de bus
review.comment_negative: Jammer dat er geen raam in de kamer zat. Bed is heerlijk en badkamer ook

review.comment_positive: Le personnel est très serviable et attentif. la communication est bonne. les chambres sont bien et confortables, quoi qu’un peu petites.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể

review.comment_positive: Gutes praktisches Hostel. Sehr gute organisierte Ha giang Loop-Tour. Das Personal war sehr hilfsbereit. Sie konnten im Vergleich zu anderen Landsleuten gut englisch. Nach der Tour kann man das Gepäck abholen und da nochmals duschen. Nachtbus direkt ab Hostel in jegliche Richtungen wird von ihnen organisiert. Würden wieder kommen.
review.comment_negative: Das Doppelzimmer hat Blick in einen Zwischengang.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: We stayed here 1 nights after doing the HaGiang loop. Very nice hostel. They kept our large bags while we did the loop and also did laundry for us while we were gone.

Le personnel super sympa 
Ouvert 24h/24 
La location de scooter 
La propreté des chambres
review.comment_negative: Rien c'était PARFAIT

review.comment_positive:
We arrived at 3 am and could check in which was very nice. Clean room. 
We did the 4d3n Ha Giang loop and it was amazing. Great guide and good homestays.
review.comment_negative: Kinda far away from the city. Breakfast was disappointing.

review.comment_positive: Nice People

review.rating: Noisy and small room but very nice staff and good price.
review.comment_positive:
Special award to the staff that was really adorable and helpful. 
They provide everything you need to do the loop (motobike and gear) but they could be more specific and take more time when explaining the trip. They just show you the map and that s all. I would have expected more details and advice. 
Very good quality motobikes. 
The room price is cheap but you should know it is very noisy. 
However it s very clean and cheap so it s good deal anyway. 
We met no police at all on the loop but we bought the international driving licence online the hostel proposed just in case. 
It is possible to have a shower before you go after the loop.
review.comment_negative:
very noisy so don t expect to have calm and silence at all. 
our room had no window so particularly suffocating. 
same pb as almost everywhere : when you shower you put some water everywhere and there is no carpet so the room can become very messy and slippery.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể

review.comment_positive:
Nice and clean. Great freshly made breakfast. Has laundry service and ha Giang loop bike tours. Very accommodating and helpful. 

We booked the ha Giang loop tour through them which was also fantastic. Great, safe guides with lots of knowledge to share. Would highly recommend

review.rating: Una salvezza nella bruttura della zona
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
premessa:
in questa città non aspettatevi chissà cosa, come buona parte delle città vietnamite é brutta, sporca e caotica. 
Detto ciò, la struttura è curata e pulita (abbiamo soggiornato in una camera con bagno privato).
Carina anche  la colazione sul roof, la vista non è un granché ma perlomeno essendo leggermente fuori dalla città c'è un pò meno confusione. 
Sempre a proposito della posizione, è a pochi minuti a piedi dalla stazione dei bus (unico modo per raggiungere Ha Giang), e posizionata tra due noleggi di scooter e moto senza i quali in questi luoghi non si può fare praticamente nulla (ci sarebbe molto da ridire anche sul famoso Loop tanto sponsorizzato che è tutto fuorché meraviglioso per chi è stato sulle Dolomiti o ha visto le Alpi almeno una volta nella vita).

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: I had a fantastic stay in Ha Giang Hostel. It's very close to the night bus stop where they dropped me off. Just walked for 2 mins. In the middle of night it's not a problem at all. The room was very clean. Breakfast with the view was great. And I was planning to rent a motorbike from them but end up with joining the Ha Giang loop tour with them. It was one of my favourite memories in my life for sure. The tour was very safe that the drivers always drove at a low speed to keep passengers safe and meantime you can absolutely enjoy the landscape on your ride. Homestays were awesome if you love the local vibes. People were very friendly and we always had a welcome party everyday! Thanks so much to our tour guide Tom and our drivers. The staff from the hostel was very helpful for everything. I'll definitely come back and do the loop again. :)

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể

In my opinion the hostel is the perfect option in Ha Giang to prepare the loop. Also the people working there are so nice and very helpful. I would recommand 100% for anyone coming to Ha Giang and seeking to do the loop.

The hostel was clean, the food was yummy and the beds were comfy. Nothing was a problem for us when booking with them. They even sent us a little information sheet on clothing needed for this time of the year. Our easy riders - Van, Trang & Thao were simply the best guides we could have asked for. They were very safe, fun and kind.

review.comment_positive: Mọi thứ đều ở mức ổn. Phòng sạch sẽ, đúng như hình ảnh trên mạng.

- the hostel is new/freshly renovated
- possible to leave bags there while doing the Ha Giang Loop
- mororbike rental - we get a brand new semi-automatic one with only 380km. All motorbikes are also perfectly cleaned when they are returned. 
- stayed just for one night before and after loop and for this purpose it was perfect
- staff can arrange bus to Hanoi or Sapa which picks you up in front of hostel. Although the bus left before the breakfast started, they arranged take away for us
- The hostel is really clean - room bathroom and common areas too
review.comment_negative:
- The private room did not have a proper window. It was not see through and there was a wall 1 meter from window when I opened it
- motorbike rental - we paid for insurance, but when we needed them because we lost our key, they replied only in couple of hours on booking.com chat. So we were able to solve it much faster by ourself. Ask for their whatsApp number - they may reply faster there.
- needed to chase them for breakfast because at the time of breakfast nobody was serving it

There’s also a room to shower / relax when you get back and are waiting for the bus which they also organised for us. review.rating: Prima Anfangs- und Endpunkt für den Loop
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Der Raum war für den Preis prima. Ausreichend Platz, die Betten sind bequem, Badezimmer war ordentlich.
Außerdem gibt es morgens ein kleines, aber leckeres Frühstück.
Wir haben uns bei dem Hostel 2 Mopeds für den Loop geliehen, die Räder waren prima in Schuss. Wir haben auch die Insurance abgeschlossen und bekamen die Kosten für einen platten Reifen anstandslos ersetzt.
Außerdem haben uns die Jungs vom Hostel gezeigt wie wir überhaupt auf den Rädern fahren und wir hätten sie bei Problemen jederzeit anrufen können.
Der Staff war sehr bemüht und ausgesprochen freundlich.
Obwohl in dem Hostel ein reges Kommen und Gehen herrscht, war es nicht übermäßig laut.
Was wir auch positiv fanden: niemand hat versucht uns eine geführte Loop Tour oder sonst irgendwas anzudrehen.
Und last but not least: wir konnten für die Dauer des Loops kostenlos unser Gepäck aufbewahren lassen.
review.comment_negative:
Neben dem Hostel ist momentan eine Baustelle. Dadurch wird es teilweise richtig laut. 
Seife im Badezimmer wäre schön gewesen. Ein Föhn hat gefehlt.

review.comment_positive:
A friend and I went on a 4D3D tour with Ha Giang Hostel and it was a great experience.
The beauty of Ha Giang is outstanding, no need to discuss it. Especially when we went out, we accidentally hunted a lot of clouds.

In terms of service, it's very good. Our two drivers: Thin and Vu drive very smoothly, always ensuring safety and taking care of customers. Whatever you need or have any questions, we will answer them.
The other drivers in the group are also very friendly and funny. Every night we can drink corn wine and sing karaoke until morning 😅

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Excelente hotel para quedarse en Ha Giang antes o después de empezar el loop calidad - precio (12€ dos personas con desayuno). Habitaciones sencillas pero súper nuevas, espaciosas y el baño muy bien - ducha separada del WC y agua caliente. 
El personal es extremadamente amable, y nos hicieron mil favores y ayudaron con muchas cosas (e.g. llamar por vídeollamada al hotel de Hanoi para encontrar un documento olvidado en la maleta q habiamos dejado allí)
El desayuno es muy simple pero el bocadillo de tortilla está muy bueno, en el rooftop que tiene unas buenas vistas. Además tienen servicio de alquiler de motos y nos dieron una nuevísima. Muy recomendable comparado con otros que estuvimos en Ha Giang.

review.rating: Clean but moldy room for a good price

review.comment_positive: Great hostel to do the loop with. Smaller hostel which means smaller groups for the loop and generally a slightly older more mature group.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Great place to sleep off the trip before (or after) heading out to Ha Giang Loop. The place is just outside of the centre and all the craziness, is very clean and well maintained. 
we stayed in a private room and had a great rest before getting on motorbikes for 4days.
this place also rents out all sorts of motorbikes, all very well looked after and makes it easy to have everything in one place. they also arrange tours, easy riders and i would assume the owner will help you with anything as he was really helpful. 
we rented us semi-automatic scooters, he explained the route and afterwards arranged us a transfer from Ha Giang as per our request while we were still enjoying our ride.

review.comment_positive: AC and fan were nice touches.
review.comment_negative: Red stains on both beds / sheets and comforter. Strands of hair on bed. Bathroom stunk for some reason. I mean it's a hostel, so it's to be expected to a degree.

review.comment_positive:
