Breakfast was simple but ok. Baguette with fried egg, some fruits, coffee and tea. That's it. For the price it's ok.
review.comment_negative: Coffee at breakfast was a powder mix with sugar and creamer. It's better to serve regular coffee.

review.comment_positive: We have spend only a night but took the Ha Giang Tour. It was super great and the team was awful !! They have booked a bus for us to head to Sa Pa aswell. The bus ran late but was great one anyway so no complaints at all !

Perfekt um von dort aus den Ha Giang Loop zu fahren. Man kann dort Motorbikes mieten (inkl. Versicherung), die wirklich in einem Top Zustand sind. Man bekommt auch noch eine Einweisung und Helme. 
Das Frühstück war ein frisches Banh Mi mit Ei auf der Dachterrasse. Total lecker. 
Gegenüber befinden sich mehrere Restaurants. Die Zimmer mit Fenster sind klasse. 
Es gibt auch welche ohne Fenster. So eines hatte ich auf der Rückreise und die sind nicht sehr schön. Also darauf achten, dass man ein Fenster hat!
נקי ומסודר. הייתי בחדר פרטי עם מקלחת ושירותים פרטיים  העה נקי מאוד ומסודר ומפתיע לחיוב בהתחשב בכך שמדובר בחדר בהוסטל

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive:
Staff is very helpful.
Good location and wifi.
Atmosphere is nice and clean.
Room is clean and quiet.
Nhân viên khá thân thiện. Khách sạn có chỗ để xe an toàn. Gia đình tôi đã có kỳ nghỉ ổn.

The manager of the hostel is a very nice guy who speaks English perfectly. The hostel arranges the Ha Giang loop tour in small groups, up to 10-12 persons. The tour guides speak English pretty good. The easy rider drivers are driving very carefully and are very good drivers, so you can enjoy the scenery, which is amazing. We did the 4 days, 3 nights tour and I can truly advise you to book the tour with this hostel. Super good Vietnamese food for lunch and dinner. Everything is arranged for, so all you have to do is enjoy the trip. You also do some hikes and visit a cave. And every day enough stops to make beautifull pictures. If you want to drive yourself and you don't have an international drivers license the drivers will help you to pass the police checkpoints. If you can afford it, book a private room: only 12 dollars extra for 3 nights. Thebeds are really more comfortable than the dorm beds. I give this tour a 10+ !!
review.comment_negative: Don't get a room on the second floor as it is close to the reception and there are guests checking in during the night, which can be rather noisy.

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive: Loads of amazing view points, and the team were awesome, drivers were fantastic, and helped with everything. Would 100% recommend. Best thing

The terrace was very nice, and location of the hotel very handy.
The room was nice and spacious and bathroom modern.
review.comment_negative:
The water system didn't allow for hot water at once for more than 10min. It became very difficult to shower comfortably as a couple, as the water turned cold very quickly
 
The bike rental wasn't ideal. The bikes  were not in the best conditions, indication for the route not really provided. 
The staff didn't appear as friendly, as any of the other locations we travelled to. ( a bit more business rather than helpful)

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Nous avons apprécié la propreté des lieux, qu’il s’agisse du dortoir ou des douches et WC. Le petit déjeuner servi était bon (boisson, fruit et banh mi) et le personnel agréable.
review.comment_negative: La nuit a été un peu courte en raison de travaux bruyants à côté et qui ont débuté très tôt le matin.

review.comment_positive: Das Personal war sehr hilfsbereit, obwohl wir sehr spät angekommen sind. Das Zimmer war sauber, das Frühstück lecker und die Aussicht von der Dachterrasse sehr schön! Man kann vor Ort eine Ha Giang Loop Tour buchen, wenn man das möchte. Oder einen Roller mieten.
review.comment_negative: Wir hatten etwas Pech mit dem Zimmer. Da es ein innenliegendes Zimmer war und nicht gut gelüftet werden konnte, hat es unangenehm modrig gerochen. Es gab nur morgens warmes Wasser zum Duschen, man konnte aber an der Rezeption Bescheid geben, dann wurde das warme Wasser eingeschaltet.

review.comment_positive: Mọi thứ đều ở mức ổn. Phòng có đủ tiện nghi cơ bản cho chuyến đi công tác.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
We stayed here before and after doing the loop with this company. Room was clean and comfortable. 
The best thing was the 4 day easy rider loop tour. Our guide was Hinh and other driver Vinh (?spelling). Hinh’s knowledge of this area was fantastic-we learnt so much. He was also able to answer all our questions and we always felt safe with both drivers.  We had many laughs as well with both and leave with wonderful memories of the trip.

review.rating: Super Preis- Leistungsverhältnis - auch top Motorbike Verleih!

Super Hostel + Zimmer (Twin Bed) für den Preis! Besonders toll fanden wir die Terrasse ganz oben mit Ausblick, auf der man das Frühstück serviert bekam. Nettes Personal. Wäscheservice war auch 1a und echt viel wert nach dem Loop.
Wir haben auch 2 Motorbikes gemietet. Eigentlich wollten wir nebenan bei dem Verleih mit 2 Buchstaben leihen, aber die Bikes des Ha Giang Hostels waren brandneu und auch das Zubehör wie Helme, Protektoren waren in super Zustand (besser als nebenan) und gab es gratis dazu.

Rented our bike from them and booked a night to stay again for one evening once completing the loop. Awesome that you can leave your excess luggage there. Such an awesome touch to give is free t-shirts once completing the loop. So friendly and helpful. Will definitely recommend staying there if doing the loop.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
We stayed here the first night, then rented a bike here for 4 days. Everything was smooth, rooms was clean, bike was new and worked perfectly. Small breakfast was served on the upstairs teracce as well.

My only recommendation is, that if you want to get to your next destination (for us it was Sa Pa) without problems and hassle (calling to 12go Asia support 10times), book your next transport with Ha Giang Hostel. they will make sure you’ll have spot in the minivan and that no one will decline to transport you. (It’s even cheaper than 12go Asia)

review.comment_positive:
호텔 위치가 Ha Giang 터미널 바로 앞에 있어서
정말 편리했다. 호텔도 지은지 얼마안된
새호텔이라서 더 마음에 들었다.
무엇보다 사장님과 직원분들이 모두
친절히 응대해줘서 여행객으로서 너무
감사하게 생각한다.

더블침대 퀸룸은 작은감이 있지만 깨끗했다.
오히려 추운날씨에 와서 저녁에 포근하게
잘수있었다.

화장실도 깨끗하고 온수도 잘 나왔다.

스쿠터도 호텔에서 하루 빌려서 주변 여행도
안전하게 잘 마쳤다.
2박3일 숙박을 하고, 3일째 아침 동반으로 
떠나는데, 사장님이 25인승 차량도 잘 
예약해줘서 아침 10시30분에 호텔앞에서 
직접 버스를 타고 동반으로 떠났다.

코로나19 기간이라서 금액이 하루 25만동으로
저렴한거 같은데, 코로나19 끝나고
여행객들 많이 오면, 꼭 번창하시길 기원합니다.

review.rating: Great place to refresh & relax before starting the loop
review.comment_positive: We arrived at 4am, the receptionist quickly checked us in and got us to our room so we could get to sleep. Even at that time in the morning, the receptionist was lovely and welcoming. The room was simple but really clean, had comfy bedding, and great shower pressure. Breakfast was the best part, beautiful view from the top floor, and a tasty hot meal. Hugely recommend before starting the Ha Giang Loop.
staff, location and breakfast!

El hostel proporciona ayuda frente a cualquier inconveniente con el arriendo de moto o accidente y sin costo adicional. Muy buen ambiente y disposicion
Did the tour and had a great time, tour leader Gau was a legend, led the group at a reasonable speed, he was very knowledgeable about the area and eager to help with whatever issues we had.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
LOVED EVERYTHING !!
- The owner and his staff were so so friendly and welcoming! We arrived on the sleeper bus at 4:30am and there was someone there to greet us and let us into our rooms.
- The hostel is VERY easy to find. You honestly can’t miss it. The location is great
- Room was very clean and comfortable. Very spacious and nice hot showers!!
- We wanted to do the Ha Giang Loop by ourselves without a guide and the owner of Ha Giang Hostel sat with us for half an hour explaining the best routes, which roads to avoid, the best Homestay’s, where to get fuel etc. He honestly made our trip so much simpler. We originally hired the bikes for 5 days but the weather was predicted to start storming so we came back a day early and without even having to ask they gave us our money back for the day we didn’t use! 

Such a great hostel with the BEST STAFF !!

review.rating: Perfetct starting point for Ha Giang Loop, I don't recommend to book the tour there
review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive:
Perfect starting point for doing the so called Ha Giang Loop, which has the most beautiful landscapes I have ever seen.
The staff at the hostel was really really kind and helped me solving a problem with my sim card.
review.comment_negative:
The tour I booked at the hostel was not worth it. 
Obviously the landscapes are amazing but I would have preferred going by myself for different reasons:
1. The guides didn't speak english and didn't explain anything about the place and the interesting people living there (even if we asked we Google Translate, they often didn't know what to say)
2. We stopped in super crowded places, just the time to take an Instagram picture (so it's really annoying if you don't care about that)
3. You had to pay for extra water and the food wasn't that much, especially for breakfast. Considering the quite expensive price I've paid, I would have expected to have water and coffee included

Das Ha Giang Hostel war für uns der perfekte Ausgangspunkt um den Ha Giang Loop in 3 Tagen zu machen. tolles neues Hostel in gutem Design und sehr praktisch eingerichtet.
Sehr hilfreiches Personal und auch der Chef sehr nett und zuvorkommend.
Wir konnten bei unserer Ankunft direkt unsere Easy-Ride Tour buchen, da das Hostel diese anbietet. in super Qualität mit super aufmerksamen Fahrern und Teamleiter der auch angemessen englisch spricht. zum Schluss wurde uns auch geholfen mit der Buchung des Nachtbus, der uns sogar direkt vor dem Hostel abholte, nachdem wir nochmals im Hostel duschen durften. genial!
wir waren suuuper happy mit einfach allem.

Zeer goede prijs kwaliteit verhouding, wij komen zeker terug! Ze bieden ook tours aan voor de ha giang loop en helpen ook bij het boeken van het transport (bus,...). Beste hostel van onze reis!

review.rating: Perfektes Hostel um ein Abenteuer zu beginnen.
review.comment_positive: Wir haben dieses Hostel gewählt um den Loop zu machen. Im Vorfeld hatten wir nichts gebucht. Dieses Hostel is perfekt organisiert für die Ankunft, den Loop zum machen sowie wie auch für die Weiterreise. Wir wurden gut informiert über den Verlauf. Ich hatte einen sehr lieben, aufmerksam, gut organisierten easy Rider (Diem). Mein Partner fuhr alleine und die ganze Crew hatten auf uns aufgepasst dass es an nichts fehlt. Es waren tolle Tage, da vom Start bis zum Ende immer jemand da war. Herzlichen Dank für die wunderschöne Zeit

Lo mejor del hotel es la posibilidad de hacer el Ha Giang Loop de 4 días con gente increíble. Fue, sin duda, la mejor experiencia de todo el viaje. Los easy riders Van y su hermano Lang son unos guías maravillosos. Conocían muy bien la zona, conducían genial y estuvieron muy atentos en todo momento. 

Le pongo un 7 al hotel en general pero la experiencia del Loop es un 10.

review.comment_positive: Great crew! Its the best place to take a Ha Giang Loop tour. The guides are the most positive people, full of energy and sooo helpfull during the ride. We could take a shower at the hostel after the trip.
review.comment_negative: The Queen room was a bit too small. The window overlooked at an interior "chimney", so the room was always dark and stuffy. We could hear all the noises of people taking shower, talking or cooking in the kitchen

review.rating: Pessima esperienza e delusione al seguito
review.comment_positive: Non saprei dire visto la pessima esperienza. L'unica nota positiva che posso dare la disponibilità della ragazza Tom, l'unica educata e cortese. Il responsabile dovrebbe imparare! In ogni caso per essere un ostello, la pulizia non è malvagia.
review.comment_negative:
Siamo arrivati pensando di stare 3 notti, avendole già prenotate su booking, ma ce ne siamo andati 1 giorno prima, mai successo nel nostro viaggio in Vietnam, di solito stiamo di più non di meno. Neanche eravamo arrivati che ci avevano mandato un messaggio dicendo che se non avremmo confermato entro le 18 del giorno di arrivo non ci avrebbero mantenuto la stanza, e già non è un buon biglietto da visita, non ti devo pregare per assicurarmi la stanza.
Arriviamo, neanche ci dà le chiavi, che subito ci vuole vendere il tour, dal momento in cui gli diciamo che non ci interessa e che volevamo solo rilassarci, non ci rivolge più la parola neanche per un ciao. 
Il giorno dopo andiamo alla reception per chiedere di lavarci per favore i vestiti, e uno dei ragazzi, ci dice siete qua per il checkout! No noi abbiamo prenotato 3 notti, e poi insiste nel chiederci se comunque volessimo andare via prima. Così abbiamo deciso di annullare una notte.
Praticamente loro guadagnano sui tour, se tu non fai il tour con loro, stai solo occupando una stanza inutilmente, non sei gradito.
Se stai cercando un posto dove riposarti e fare trekking o hiking in solitaria, Ha Giang non è il posto giusto. A partire dall'affitto dei motorini che se non hai la patente Internazionale non te li danno e in più, mai visto così tanti controlli sulle strade. In giro per il Vietnam fanno le peggio cose sulle strade, ma qui puntano i turisti, per fare multe per qualsiasi motivo.
Oltre a questa disavventura, la seconda notte ho dovuto fare la doccia fredda.

Bagno ottimo negli spazi, con la presa vicino al lavello. Acqua calda.
Ascensore.
Wifi buono.
Aria condizionata funzionante (anche per il calore).
Abbiamo fatto il loop con l'organizzazione di questa struttura ed è stato davvero memorabile, ben organizzato, divertentissimo.

review.comment_negative:
The room does not have window and ventilation, so the humidity is high and there is not air in the room.
The room was not properly cleaned and the sheets were dirty.
The room does not include toilet paper and you have to ask for it in the reception.

Be careful with renting a motorbike, as they will want to take your passport and driving licence during the whole rental period.
The motorbikes you will see parked in front is not the ones you will get, after signing the contract they will give you an old bike and you cannot choose it for yourself as they would say it is the only one for you. Even the price is the same as for the new one.
Read carefully the contract, as insurance will cover only the exterior of the motorbike and the tyres, all the other things is excluded. If you will broke down on the road all expences is on you and they dont take responsibility , you will have to manage to return bike by yourself and after their cheking, they will decide it is your foult that the bike broke down. Full fuel tank is also not included. And if somebody will steal motorbike, you gave to pay the full price for the new one (even if it is an old bike you are renting and even if they say it is not possible for bike to be stolen, which sounds like a scam).

review.comment_positive: Great jumping off point for the Ha Giang loop. We rented two Honda blades here too and they were new and reliable. The helmets are a bit big (for women) so bring a baseball cap or something to put on under. The room was clean and very comfortable. Best part is the upstairs rooftop where they serve breakfast in the morning. The hostel also organized a sleeper bus that picked us up directly from the hostel.

The scooters are prestine and you can leave your big backpack with them while you do the loop. They even let us hangout at the hostel when we got back until our bus left for Ha Long Bay. review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive:
宿は清掃が行き届き、広々スペースで快適でした。
オーナーやスタッフは親切で気が利く方々です。
宿で予約した3日間ループツアーは皆におすすめします。面白く優しいスタッフと美しい自然を感じられ、最高の思い出です。
Ha Giang Hostelを選んで良かったです。ありがとうございました！
Awasome staff

I'm not only rating this Hostel as accommodation but mainly for their Ha Giang loop tour, which I highly recommend taking with them!

Firstly, we got a very nice private room for free one day prior to the tour. Cleanliness was on a spot, the beds were very comfortable, and the room was very bright and spacious. Nothing to complain about!

And now the tour itself. It was THE HIGHLIGHT of our trip in Vietnam, no joking! We had an amazing guide Viet - he's the sweetest person ever, very helpful, very friendly and highly experienced driver.

We've chosen one heavy rider for one of us, and self riding one motorbike. Everything was excellent, we had some heavy rain and bad weather along the route, but it didn't ruin our experience, because you can't control the weather. Of course, we had some sunny days and beautiful views too. We really enjoyed this tour and wouldn't take it with someone else, as we figured out other tours are with much bigger groups (10+ people), often more expensive, etc.

We ended only with one other couple, so our group had only five people including our guide.

If we're returning back to Vietnam, we will definitely take this tour with Ha Giang Hostel again!

review.rating: Perfect hostel voor en na de Ha Giang Loop
review.comment_positive: Het hostel lijkt wel een hotel. Mooie kamers en alles super strak geregeld. Ook kunnen ze je perfect helpen voor het plannen van de Ha Giang Loop. De motoren die ze verhuren zijn goed.
review.comment_negative: De kamer had een raam naar een ruimte achter de lift. Hier scheen de hele nacht super veel licht doorheen. Erg irritant met slapen.

review.comment_positive: Nhìn chung là hài lòng với số tiền bỏ ra. Phòng sạch, đúng như mô tả.

review.rating: Perfektes Hotel für den Ha Giang Loop
review.comment_positive: Perfekter Start für den Ha Giang Loop. Zimmer und Frühstück war gut und mit fantastischem Ausblick, der die Vorfreude steigerte. Auch die Mitarbeiter waren extrem zuvorkommend und hilfsbereit. Wir haben am Morgen ein Motorrad ausgeliehen und eine Karte mit super Hinweisen und Empfehlungen eingezeichnet bekommen. Zusätzlich eine Whatsapp-Nr., über die man bei Problemen mit der Polizei oder dem Motorrad jemanden erreichen konnte. Rucksäcke durften im Hotel gelagert werden. Außerdem wurde direkt für den Tag unserer Rückkehr ein Bus zur Weiterfahrt gebucht, vor welcher wir nochmal duschen konnten.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_negative: schlecht angebunden, wenig hilfreiches Personal, extrem unhygienische Handtücher, schlechte Klimaanlage, Frühstück ok

review.rating: Fantastic motorcycle trip! Ming was the best!
review.comment_positive: The motorcycle trip through them was fantastic! Ming was our guide and he was just amazing! Couldn’t have had a more fun trip!
review.comment_negative: The actual hostel needs a bigger waiting area for people who are done the motorcycle trip and are waiting for the bus. Also having a better area for luggage storage wouldn’t be a bad idea

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: In general, the hostel is ok, quite clean. The breakfast was good.
review.comment_negative:
We had to pay for the night just for them to keep our luggage. This would usually be ok but we did the Ha Giang loop with the same company and essentially double-paid the accommodation at two spots at the same time. 
There was no free water for breakfast.

review.rating: This hostel wants you to have a great time.
review.comment_positive:
We arrived to the hostel super late (1am ish), and we were still able to check in and greeted by staff. We booked the loop with this hostel, and it was easy to do. the loop tour was amazing and our guide Minh was a legend, he really wanted to make sure everyone had a great time. 
When we got back from the loop, the hostel allowed us to shower and freshen up before getting the bus back to Hanoi. We also booked our bus back to Hanoi through the hostel which was handy.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: La habitación dormitorio era muy espaciosa,  el desayuno incluido con fruta y bocadillo muy rico. Hicimos el loop con ellos y la verdad que muy bien. El personal muy amable.
review.comment_negative: Contraté el ticket de bus con ellos, de Ha Giang a Cat Ba a las 7 pm y es el peor bus en el que he ido en todo Vietnam, muy caro, 600kd en sleep bus con un montón de paradas para recoger bultos, sin cortinas ni cargador, he ido en otros por la mitad de precio,  con las mismas horas y sin paradas . Muy decepcionada con el servicio. Mejor contratar el bus en otro lugar, por ese precio es un ROBO.

review.comment_positive: Anh chủ nhiet tinh chỉ dẫn chi tiet cho minh biet để đi . Phong rẻ đẹp sach se .

review.comment_positive: J’aurais mis 10 si j’avais pu dormir la nuit… Hostel très propre, lits confortables, AC dans les chambres, personnel très sympa (ils m’ont donné de quoi manger et boire avant mon voyage de 12h en bus), casiers, serviettes, sandales… Les bus viennent vous prendre devant la porte… Bref sur le papier tout est super !
review.comment_negative:
Les check-in en plein milieu de la nuit ! Je pense que le personnel devrait prévoir une chambre pour ceux qui arrivent dans la nuit pour éviter de réveiller ceux qui se réveillent à 5/6h ou qui vont faire le Ha Giang Loop le lendemain. J’ai à peine dormi à cause de ça, et c’est dommage car l’hostel est super sinon !
Du papier toilette à disposition aurait été aussi plutôt appréciable !

review.comment_positive: La atención recibida por parte del personal y la comodidad de las camas
review.comment_negative: El servicio de lavandería se puede mejorar

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Wir haben die Tour für den Ha Giang Loop über das Hostel gebucht. Es war einer der besten Erfahrungen die wir in unserer langen Asien Reise gemacht haben. Eine tolle Gruppe an Teilnehmern und sehr coole und freundliche Fahrer. Wir haben easy rider dazu gebucht gehabt, unsere Fahrer Minh, Dé, Hung, Dinh, Chung und Duong haben unsere 4 Tage Tour so angenehm gestaltet wie es nur ging. Wir sind sehr dankbar für diese tolle Zeit und wünschen allen nur das Beste.
Trés bon logement pour les personnes souhaitant faire la Ha Giang Loop. L'équipe est top ! Je recommande à 100%
Khách sạn đáp ứng được nhu cầu cơ bản của cả nhóm. Giá cả hợp lý.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Very clean, a polished service. Accommodated an early morning breakfast.
Great value for money and would recommend to anyone .

review.comment_negative: Bit of pressure to hire bikes, they told me they were the same place as QT so it didnt matter if I signed and paid with them or QT which isnt true.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Soggiornato in due notti diverse. Entrambe le stanze (tutte dotate di finestra, la seconda notte era ancora meglio con grande vetrata) erano ordinate, pulite e con tutto il necessario. L'intero ostello è ordinato e pulito. 
È fuori città il che è decisamente un punto a favore visto il caos che c'è sempre nelle città vietnamite. Ad ogni modo in zona serve per forza un noleggio scooter e qui si può trovare. Vicino alla stazione degli autobus e qualche posto dove mangiare di fronte. 
Colazione buona (panino con uovo) anche se un po' scarna.

review.rating: Très correct pour démarrer ou finir la loop

Hôtel assez récent donc très bien niveau équipements

C’est l’usine… 
Accueil froid si vous ne réservez pas la loop avec eux (nous avions notre propre moto). 
Pas de fenêtre dans les chambres doubles. 
Petit dej Banh Mi pas fou ! 
Attention à la laundry ils m’ont perdu une chaussette et un sac…

review.comment_positive: very nice hostel! Perfect as a starting point for the ha giang loop! I had a great time with a small group with very nice people.

review.rating: Top hostel. Prima om hier de Hiang Loop bij te boeken
review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive:
+dorms met gordijnen 
+kluisje voor je dagrugzak
+warme douches 
+handoek
+mooi dakterras waar je overdag in de zon kan zitten en waar in de ochtend het ontbijt is 
+Vriendelijk personeel 
+er werd een take away ontbijt geregeld toen ik vroeg de bus terug naar Hanoi nam

Ik heb ook de 4 dagen 3 nachten loop geboekt bij het hostel. 
Ik wilde zelf rijden, maar op aanraden van wat andere backpackers uit het hostel toch voor een easyrider gekozen, omdat ik geen motorrijbewijs heb. Uiteindelijk 3 politie checkpoints tegen gekomen. Ook de zelf rijders zijn daar met wat handigheidjes van de easyriders langs gekomen.
De loop was een enorm gave ervaring. Ik raad hem iedereen aan. We waren de eerste 3 dagen met een groep van 12 en de laatste dag splitste we op en gingen we met 3 man verder. Onderweg erg gezellige avonden gehad.

Speciale dank naar mijn easy rider: Xuan Kustes! 

Tip: pizza restaurant tegenover het hostel. Als afwisseling tussen het heerlijke Vietnamese eten door.
review.comment_negative:
-fleece dekens op de bedden. Vind ik altijd wat zweterig. 
-wc papier was een paar keer op. Gelukkig zijn er op iedere verdieping twee wc's dus ben een keer naar een andere verdieping verhuist

review.comment_positive:
Il proprietario della struttura è davvero simpatico ed è stato molto gentile nel darci tanti consigli sulle  cose da fare e da vedere in zona. È stato davvero fantastico!
La struttura è davvero bella, molto pulita e ha una bellissima terrazza dove fare colazione o fare due chiacchiere la sera con altri viaggiatori. La stanza era piccola e con una finestra interna, ma siamo stati bene e per il prezzo ottimo della stanza va bene. Letto abbastanza comodo.  La posizione è buona per prendere i bus per varie località. Ha anche un servizio di noleggio motorini, non molto economici ma è comunque comodo avere questo servizio il loco. Super consigliato.

Besonders freundliches Personal und toller Service, der keine Wünsche offen lässt. Ich habe von hier meine Motorradtour durch den Ha Giang Loop gestartet und wurde super beraten.

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường

review.rating: Boek hier je hostel en je kan daarna bij het hostel de Ha Giang loop boeken!
review.comment_positive: Het hostel was schoon en netjes. Beter dan we hadden verwacht. Als je nog aan het zoeken bent om de Ha Giang loop te boeken, zoek niet verder. Boek een nacht in het hostel en je krijgt informatie over welke tour je kan doen. Wij hebben 3 dagen en 2 nachten gedaan maar het was echt geweldig en gezellig. Het was een kleine groep, super leuke gidsen, mooie en goede overnachtingen en ook nog is lekker eten. Wij kunnen het meer dan aanraden! Nogmaals dank aan Dau, Pao, Van & Sinh❤️
Không gian khá yên tĩnh, giường ngủ cũng thoải mái. Một trải nghiệm tương đối dễ chịu.

We booked a room there and had planned to take part in Ha Giang Loop tour with another company, but then we noticed so many great reviews of tours organized by Ha Giang Hostel. And they are definitely true! We took 3D2N, and it was one of the best experiences in Vietnam.

We booked also a ticket to Ha Long, and they let us to take a shower and leave our backpacks for a while after the tour and before departure (pick-up was in front of the hostel).
review.comment_negative: Everything okay!

review.comment_negative: We booked this place because they rent motobikes and we wanted to rent one, to do Ha Giang loop by ourselves. Some months before our trip, we contacted the hostel to know how it worked the renting and their reply was that we would take care of that in the check-in. When we arrive, we realized that we could not rent the motobike, because we did not have internacional driver license and had to pay for 2 easyriders (which were really nice). Even being aware that this was our responsability to check, we think that they could had informed us the first time that we contacted them, asking for what was necessary for the booking of the motobikes.

review.rating: INCREÍBLE experiencia Ha Giang Loop 3D2N con Ha Giang Hostel
review.comment_positive: INCREÍBLE experiencia Ha Giang Hostel. Reservamos con ellos el loop de 3D2N y fue la mejor experiencia de todas. Ellos se encargan de todo, desde el traslado desde Hanoi, el tour completo, y el traslado de vuelta a Hanoi. Respecto a la habitación, es increíble para el precio, tiene todo lo necesario para prepararse para iniciar el loop. El loop en sí mismo fue sin duda lo mejor de nuestro viaje. Nuestro guía Minh fue el mejor de todos, muy amable y chistoso, siempre pendiente de que todos estuviéramos bien. Los easydrivers son muy profesionales y se nota que tienen mucha experiencia (estuvimos con chun y cua y fueron muy buenos!!). Los lugares donde comimos y los homestays donde dormimos también fueron buenísimos, por lo que en resumen, recomiendo a ojos cerrados Ha Giang Hostel, muy buena experiencia.
review.comment_negative: Todo fue perfecto.

review.rating: Modern clean comfy accommodation with friendly competent staff and well maintained motorbikes
review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive: I brought a group of friends to tour Ha Giang again (having previously stayed with Jasmine Hostel) and choose Ha Giang Hostel because it is a bright and modern spacious hostel with clean facilities, private and comfy bunk beds and an amazing rooftop area serving breakfast with a view. All the staff were very friendly and competent. They all spoke English and there were no misunderstandings which makes traveling in Vietnam so much easier. The manager was on site and very friendly. All the motorbikes are cleaned every day to look like new and are well maintained. All the prices are good market value and transparent. I would strongly recommend against going to the Mr. Hung restaurant opposite as it is usual to find good western food outside of major cities in Vietnam and this was no exception. If you are happy to use a bit of Google translate then walk further up the road to a local Vietnamese which you will see is much busier and cheaper.
review.comment_negative: For such a detail oriented person I really can't think of anything at fault with out stay at Ha Giang Hostel :)

review.rating: Super service en begrijpen het helemaal
review.comment_positive: service was super, we zijn geholpen met de tour zodat we zelf konden rijden. We kwamen aan om 4 uur door een verlate bus uit Hanoi en konden gewoon inchecken. een 10!
review.comment_negative: niets op aan te merken.

review.rating: Muy buen hostel, pero deberian modificar el precio del Ha Giang Loop
review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Muy buen precio por una habitacion super comoda y limpia e incluye el desayuno. El bus te deja directo en la puerta y te reciben a cualquier hora (llegamos 4 am) tuvimos un problema con unos pagos y lo recibieron sumamente bien y con mucho profesionalismo. El staff habla muy bien ingles y siempre tienen una sonrisa para darte y están completamente a disposición. Hicimos el Ha giang loop con ellos y estuvo super!
review.comment_negative: El precio que tienen del HA GIANG LOOP es de US$230 pero luego lo pasan a dongs con un cambio a $25.000 (en ningun lado consigues este cambio)  por lo que terminas pagando MAS en dolares. Deberían ofrecerlo directamente en dongs y ya, porque es engañoso. Por suerte lo reclamamos y lo resolvieron. Pero deberian modificar esta modalidad. También, creo que el precio del loop acá es más caro, lo pagamos pensando que iba a ser mas seguro o "VIP" pero no, luego vimos otros grupos con mas protecciones que nosotros, es todo lo mismo. Los conductores igualmente son MUY respetuosos, divertidos y cuidadosos y lo pasamos super.

review.comment_positive: Relación calidad/precio increíble. Te ofrecen hasta desayuno. Alquilamos la moto para hacer el loop y fueron muy amables, nos explicaron todo lo que necesitamos y a la vuelta nos dejaron duchar antes de irnos.

review.comment_positive:
Das Personal unterstützt bei Fragen zur Route oder Interesse an einer Tour, es wird einem aber keine Tour aufgezwungen!

Wir haben uns nach einer Beratung dazu entschieden, zwei Easy-Rider zu buchen und waren sehr glücklich damit. Wir hätten allerdings (trotz offener Kommunikation eines fehlenden Motorradführerscheins) auch selbst einen Roller mieten können.

Auch die Unterkunft als solche war super – saubere, komfortable Zimmer und ein solides Frühstück. Nach dem Loop konnten wir kostenfrei duschen und haben sogar noch ein Wasser und T-Shirt geschenkt bekommen. Absolute Empfehlung!

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Super Hostel, per WhatsApp wurden meine Fragen schon im Voraus beantwortet, da wir den Anschlussbus in Hanoi verpasst hatten, brauchten wir einen neuen Transfer nach Ha Giang. Das Hostel hat uns per WhatsApp geholfen diesen zu organisieren und ein private Driver hat uns dann eingesammelt und nach Ha Giang gebracht. Der Loop war super - auch wenn wir echt schlechtes Wetter hatte. Mein Easy Rider Vĩnh ist sehr sicher gefahren und hat mich mit Regensachen versorgt, so dass ich nicht nass wurde. Alle Easy Rider sind gut ausgestattet und haben feste Schuhe an - die war bei anderen Touren nicht der Fall! Das essen war mir das Beste, welches ich in 3 Wochen Vietnam gegessen habe und das Happy Water hat uns lustige Abende gebracht. 😊 jederzeit gerne wieder!
The place was clean, staff were very friendly and they organised the whole Ha Giang motorbike loop for us with easy riders which was my favorite thing I did in Vietnam.

review.rating: Amazing Hostel with great hospitality and servicr
review.comment_positive: Everything! The hostel is so clean and it provided a simple yet fulfilling breakfast. The best part is the people there! Viet is an amazing host, he was so helpful and he helped us to manage the Ha Giang Loop adjusting our time and need. He was also really caring and tried his best to make our stay comfortable. Thom the female staff was also very nice and helpful. I strongly recommend this hostel for staying and for the Loop.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Zimmer mit Bergblick war sehr schön. Auf unserer Tour mit dem dort gemieteten Roller konnten wir bei Problemen sehr schnell jemanden erreichen und Hilfe bekommen. Das war wirklich super. Auch das Personal im Hostel selbst war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Nach der Rückkehr von unserer Rollertour durften wir sogar noch kostenlos im Hostel duschen und konnten vor Ort schnell und einfach einen Bus zurück nach Hanoi buchen. Würde es weiter empfehlen :)
review.comment_negative: Wir haben zuerst ein falsches Zimmer bekommen, konnten aber in der zweiten Nacht (haben 2 Nächte gebucht) das Zimmer wechseln und haben für die erste Nacht einen Rabatt bekommen, weshalb es okay war.  Wir hatten dort auch Roller für den Ha Giang Loop gemietet. Der Zustand des Rollers war in Ordnung, es waren schon ein paar Sachen durch einen vorherigen Sturz kaputt, wir konnten die Strecke aber gut damit machen, also nicht so schlimm. Etwas schade war, dass es nur Helme in Einheitsgröße gab, weshalb ich keinen passenden finden konnte.

review.comment_positive:
Le personnel est attentif, proactif et s'adapte aux projets de chacun pour l'organisation des tours en scooter. Suite à un accident de ma copine ils ont été très prévenant, allant jusqu'à aller chercher le nécessaire en pharmacie sans que nous ayons exprimé une demande.
Les chambres sont confortables et le petit dejeuner copieux. Nous sommes passés par eux pour faire la ha giang loop, mention spéciale à Hing, un de nos guides et chauffeurs qui a partagé avec enthousiasme la culture de son pays.
L'hotel est hors de la ville mais celle-ci n'a pas d'interet. Il est sur la ha giang loop et proche de la gare routiere.
Nous avons ou prendre une douche avant de prendre  notre bus. Ils ont organisé notre voyage retour, ce qui nous a évité une queue pour entrer dans le bus.
Bref allez y les yeux fermés.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
Very friendly and helpful staff. They gave us valuable tips for the loop which we did on our own with motorbikes rented from them. After the loop we took a shower in the hostel and the staff helped us with calling the vietnamese speaking bus company, which we booked ourselfes.
The hostel is close to the central bus station (walkable distance).

Would recommend to anyone

review.comment_positive: Bon rapport qualité prix. Ce n'était pas le gros luxe ou confort, mais c'était bien pour la nuit qu'on y passait avant de partir pour Ha Giang Loop. Le déjeuner était bon et la vue (de la salle de déjeuner) était un truc de ouf!
review.comment_negative: L'hostel est un peu loin des restaurants et de l'action, mais au moins en Grab, ça ne coute pas grand chose.

review.rating: Awesome people in a perfect hostel for an Ha Giang trip
review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive:
Highly recommanded ! The hostel is really good and the personnal helpfull. We arrived at 3:00 am and we were able to check-in, the room was really clean as well as the shared bathroom (soap available). 
It is also a good spot to rent bike. We had troubles with a bike and the guy was absolutely available to quickly find a solution, we wait maximum 15 min while being 5 hours away from the hostel. At the end of our motor bike trip, even if we didn't have a room anymore, we were able to take a shower before leaving. 
Finnaly, i forget a jacket at the hostel and the personnel find it and send it to Hanoi to allow me get it back, so kind.

review.room_type: Giường Đơn trong Phòng ngủ tập thể
review.comment_positive: Giá cả rất phù hợp, có nhiều dịch vụ cho khách du lịch. Lần này đi một mình nên không ở lại lâu nhưng đánh giá cao thái độ phục vụ của home
Haben dort die Nacht vor dem Loop geschlafen, war komfortabel und bequem. Frühstück war auch super lecker!

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
- motos en très bon état 
- chambres confortables

Perfect localisation 
Helpful staff

El personal es muy amable, las motos están en perfecto estado, los dueños te dan todos los tips para la ruta, te dan unos mapas que te facilitan todo. Te ayudan a sacar la licencia internacional, te reservan el bus para traslado a otras ciudades, puedes dejar tus equipaje en el hotel y al regreso te puedes dar una ducha. 100% recomendado

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: L’hôtel est neuf. La jeune femme à l’accueil est très serviable. Possibilité de louer un scooter
review.comment_negative: Le petit dej est un peu basique.

review.comment_positive: Super nahe an der Busstation, bequeme Betten, nettes Personal, gute und neue Bikes
review.comment_negative: Leider sehr hellhörig und eine Baustelle aktuell nebenan

review.rating: Super Unterkunft für den Ha Giang Loop!
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Wir haben die Tour über das Hostel gebucht und würden es jederzeit wieder so machen. Die Easy-Rider waren alle super nett und wir haben uns rundum wohl gefühlt. Vor der Abreise haben wir eine Nacht im Doppelzimmer verbracht, was einfach nur perfekt war.

Room was nice, staff very helpful, breakfast is omlette in the bun and some fruit. Room was cleaned everyday and bathroom was good. You can rent bikes here and I can recommend that. We didnt book bike in advance and there was still a lot to choose from. There is plenty to choose from and you can try as many as you like until you find your fit.
Also, there is an restourant across the street where the the food is great and where everyone go.
review.comment_negative: Coriander in the omlette should be optional and can be made with less oil :)

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive:
The staff was really really nice and helped us organize our Trip. We booked our motorbike and all the Transfers via Ha Giang Hostel. We also got an early breakfast due to our early departure. They serve a hot breakfast (bread with egg, Butter or Jam) and you get some fresh fruits and biscuits.
When something seemed off with the Bike, we just told the staff and they fixed it during the night.
We would totally recommend this place for a stay in Ha Giang.
